                                                                                Secured by basic
                                                                                • Request

                                                                                Query Parameters

                                                                                • startIndex: (string)

                                                                                  optional; specify starting point for retrieving the logs

                                                                                • pageSize: (string - default: 256)

                                                                                  optional; limit the max number of entries returned. Valid range is 1-1024

                                                                                nwfabric

                                                                                Network virtualization components

                                                                                nwfabricConfig /configure post put delete

                                                                                Install components

                                                                                post

                                                                                Install network virtualization components

                                                                                put

                                                                                Upgrade network virtualization components

                                                                                delete

                                                                                Delete network virtualization components

                                                                                post nwfabricConfig /2.0/nwfabric/configure

                                                                                Install network virtualization components

                                                                                Secured by basic
                                                                                • Request

                                                                                Query Parameters

                                                                                • action: (string)

                                                                                  If used, set to "synchronize" to reset communication between NSX Manager and a host/cluster

                                                                                Body

                                                                                Type: application/xml

                                                                                Schema:

                                                                                <nwFabricFeatureConfig>
    <featureId></featureId>
    <resourceConfig>
        <resourceId></resourceId>
    </resourceConfig>
</nwFabricFeatureConfig>

                                                                                Example:

                                                                                Prepare a cluster (install VIBs) =>
<nwFabricFeatureConfig>
  <resourceConfig>
    <resourceId>domain-c26</resourceId>
  </resourceConfig>
</nwFabricFeatureConfig>

VXLAN Context Configuration =>
<nwFabricFeatureConfig>
  <featureId>com.vmware.vshield.vsm.vxlan</featureId>
  <resourceConfig>
    <resourceId>dvs-34</resourceId>
    <configSpec class="vdsContext">
      <switch>
        <objectId>dvs-34</objectId>
      </switch>
      <teaming>FAILOVER_ORDER</teaming>
      <mtu>1600</mtu>
    </configSpec>
  </resourceConfig>
</nwFabricFeatureConfig>

VXLAN Cluster Prep =>
<nwFabricFeatureConfig>
  <featureId>com.vmware.vshield.vsm.vxlan</featureId>
  <resourceConfig>
    <resourceId>domain-c26</resourceId>
    <configSpec class="clusterMappingSpec">
      <switch>
        <objectId>dvs-34</objectId>
      </switch>
      <ipPoolId>ipaddresspool-3</ipPoolId>
      <vlanId>100</vlanId>
      <vmknicCount>1</vmknicCount>
    </configSpec>
  </resourceConfig>
</nwFabricFeatureConfig>

                                                                                put nwfabricConfig /2.0/nwfabric/configure

                                                                                Upgrade network virtualization components

                                                                                Secured by basic
                                                                                • Request

                                                                                Body

                                                                                Type: application/xml

                                                                                Schema:

                                                                                <nwFabricFeatureConfig>
    <featureId></featureId>
    <resourceConfig>
        <resourceId></resourceId>
    </resourceConfig>
</nwFabricFeatureConfig>

                                                                                delete nwfabricConfig /2.0/nwfabric/configure

                                                                                Delete network virtualization components

                                                                                Secured by basic
                                                                                • Request

                                                                                Body

                                                                                Type: application/xml

                                                                                Schema:

                                                                                <nwFabricFeatureConfig>
    <featureId></featureId>
    <resourceConfig>
        <resourceId></resourceId>
    </resourceConfig>
</nwFabricFeatureConfig>

                                                                                nwfabricFeatures /features get

                                                                                get

                                                                                Retrieves all features available on the cluster

                                                                                get nwfabricFeatures /2.0/nwfabric/features

                                                                                Retrieves all features available on the cluster

                                                                                Secured by basic

                                                                                  nwfabricStatus /status get

                                                                                  get

                                                                                  Retrieves the Status of Resources

                                                                                  get nwfabricStatus /2.0/nwfabric/status

                                                                                  Retrieves the Status of Resources

                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                  Query Parameters

                                                                                  • resource: required (string)

                                                                                    This is a valid vCenter MOID, e.g. domain-c34 for a cluster

                                                                                  childStatus /child/{parentResourceID} get

                                                                                  Status of child resources

                                                                                  get

                                                                                  Retrieve status

                                                                                  get childStatus /2.0/nwfabric/status/child/{parentResourceID}

                                                                                  Retrieve status

                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                  • parentResourceID: required (string)

                                                                                    Parent resource ID

                                                                                  statusResourceType /alleligible/{resourceType} get

                                                                                  Status of resources by criterion

                                                                                  get

                                                                                  Query status of resources by criterion

                                                                                  get statusResourceType /2.0/nwfabric/status/alleligible/{resourceType}

                                                                                  Query status of resources by criterion

                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                  • resourceType: required (string)

                                                                                    Valid resource type

                                                                                  securityFabric

                                                                                  Security fabric

                                                                                  securityFabric /2.0/si/deploy post put

                                                                                  post

                                                                                  Deploy security fabric

                                                                                  put

                                                                                  Upgrade service to recent version

                                                                                  post securityFabric /2.0/si/deploy

                                                                                  Deploy security fabric

                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                  Query Parameters

                                                                                  • startTime: (string)

                                                                                    Time to start deployment task. If not specified, deploy immediately

                                                                                  Body

                                                                                  Type: application/xml

                                                                                  Schema:

                                                                                  <clusterDeploymentConfigs>
    <clusterDeploymentConfig>
        <clusterId></clusterId>
        <datastore></datastore>
        <services>
            <serviceDeploymentConfig>
                <serviceId></serviceId>
                <dvPortGroup></dvPortGroup>
                <ipPool></ipPool>
            </serviceDeploymentConfig>
        </services>
    </clusterDeploymentConfig>
</clusterDeploymentConfigs>

                                                                                  put securityFabric /2.0/si/deploy

                                                                                  Upgrade service to recent version

                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                  Query Parameters

                                                                                  • startTime: (string)

                                                                                    optional; specify time to start upgrade

                                                                                  Body

                                                                                  Type: application/xml

                                                                                  Schema:

                                                                                  <clusterDeploymentConfigs>
    <clusterDeploymentConfig>
        <clusterId></clusterId>
        <datastore></datastore>
        <services>
            <serviceDeploymentConfig>
                <serviceId></serviceId>
                <serviceInstanceId></serviceInstanceId>
                <dvPortGroup></dvPortGroup>
                <ipPool></ipPool>
            </serviceDeploymentConfig>
        </services>
    </clusterDeploymentConfig>
</clusterDeploymentConfigs>

                                                                                  service /service/{serviceID} get delete

                                                                                  Working with a specified service

                                                                                  get

                                                                                  Retrieve all clusters on which the service is installed

                                                                                  delete

                                                                                  Uninstall specified service from specified clusters

                                                                                  get service /2.0/si/deploy/service/{serviceID}

                                                                                  Retrieve all clusters on which the service is installed

                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                  • serviceID: required (string)

                                                                                    Specified service

                                                                                  delete service /2.0/si/deploy/service/{serviceID}

                                                                                  Uninstall specified service from specified clusters

                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                  • serviceID: required (string)

                                                                                    Specified service

                                                                                  Query Parameters

                                                                                  • clusters: (string)

                                                                                    Comma-separated list of cluster id's that service needs to be uninstalled from

                                                                                  • startTime: (string)

                                                                                    Time for uninstall to be scheduled. If not specified, uninstall immediately

                                                                                  serviceDependency /dependsOn get

                                                                                  Identify service on which the specified service depends on

                                                                                  get

                                                                                  Identify service on which the specified service depends on

                                                                                  get serviceDependency /2.0/si/deploy/service/{serviceID}/dependsOn

                                                                                  Identify service on which the specified service depends on

                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                  • serviceID: required (string)

                                                                                    Specified service

                                                                                  serviceCluster /cluster/{clusterID} get delete

                                                                                  Working with installed services on a cluster

                                                                                  get

                                                                                  Retrieve all services deployed along with their status

                                                                                  delete

                                                                                  Uninstall a service. Fails if you try to remove a service that another service depends on

                                                                                  get serviceCluster /2.0/si/deploy/cluster/{clusterID}

                                                                                  Retrieve all services deployed along with their status

                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                  • clusterID: required (string)

                                                                                    Cluster ID

                                                                                  delete serviceCluster /2.0/si/deploy/cluster/{clusterID}

                                                                                  Uninstall a service. Fails if you try to remove a service that another service depends on

                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                  • clusterID: required (string)

                                                                                    Cluster ID

                                                                                  Query Parameters

                                                                                  • services: (string)

                                                                                    Comma-separated list of service id's to specify which services to uninstall

                                                                                  • startTime: (string)

                                                                                    time for uninstall to be scheduled. If not specified, do immediately

                                                                                  serviceDetails /service/{serviceID} get

                                                                                  Information about a service

                                                                                  get

                                                                                  Retrieve detailed information about the service

                                                                                  get serviceDetails /2.0/si/deploy/cluster/{clusterID}/service/{serviceID}

                                                                                  Retrieve detailed information about the service

                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                  URI Parameters

                                                                                  • clusterID: required (string)

                                                                                    Cluster ID

                                                                                  • serviceID: required (string)

                                                                                    Service ID on cluster

                                                                                  dataSecurityConfiguration

                                                                                  Configuring Data Security

                                                                                  dlpRegulation /regulation get

                                                                                  Data loss prevention regulation

                                                                                  get

                                                                                  Retrieve the list of available regulations for a policy.

                                                                                  get dlpRegulation /2.0/dlp/regulation

                                                                                  Retrieve the list of available regulations for a policy.

                                                                                  Secured by basic

                                                                                    dlpEnableRegulation /policy/regulations put

                                                                                    Enable one or more regulations by putting the regulation IDs into the policy. You can get the IDs from the output of the dlpRegulation GET call

                                                                                    put

                                                                                    Enable one or more regulations by putting the regulation IDs into the policy. You can get the IDs from the output of the dlpRegulation GET call

                                                                                    put dlpEnableRegulation /2.0/dlp/policy/regulations

                                                                                    Enable one or more regulations by putting the regulation IDs into the policy. You can get the IDs from the output of the dlpRegulation GET call

                                                                                    Secured by basic
                                                                                    • Request

                                                                                    Body

                                                                                    Type: application/xml

                                                                                    Schema:

                                                                                    <set>
    <long></long>
</set>

                                                                                    dlpClassificationValue /classificationvalue get

                                                                                    Classification values associated with regulations

                                                                                    get

                                                                                    Get all classification values

                                                                                    get dlpClassificationValue /2.0/dlp/classificationvalue

                                                                                    Get all classification values

                                                                                    Secured by basic

                                                                                      dlpRegexClassificationValue /policy/classificationvalues put

                                                                                      Configure a customized regex as a classification value

                                                                                      put

                                                                                      Configure a customized regex as a classification value

                                                                                      put dlpRegexClassificationValue /2.0/dlp/policy/classificationvalues

                                                                                      Configure a customized regex as a classification value

                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                      Body

                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                      <set>
    <ClassificationValue>
        <id></id>
        <classification>
            <id></id>
            <name></name>
            <providerName></providerName>
            <description></description>
            <customizable></customizable>
        </classification>
        <value></value>
    </ClassificationValue>
</set>

                                                                                                  dlpScanning /scanop put

                                                                                                  Start, pause, resume, or stop a data security scan

                                                                                                  put

                                                                                                  Start, pause, resume, or stop a data security scan

                                                                                                  put dlpScanning /2.0/dlp/scanop

                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                  Body

                                                                                                  Type: application/xml

                                                                                                  Schema:

                                                                                                  include schemas/dlpScanning.xml

                                                                                                  dlpScanStatus /scanstatus get

                                                                                                  Retrieve the status of a scan operation

                                                                                                  get

                                                                                                  Retrieve the status of a scan operation

                                                                                                  get dlpScanStatus /2.0/dlp/scanstatus

                                                                                                  Retrieve the status of a scan operation

                                                                                                  Secured by basic

                                                                                                    dlpScanVMs /scan/current/vms/{ID} get

                                                                                                    Retrieve information about the vm's being scanned

                                                                                                    get

                                                                                                    Retrieve information about the vm's being scanned

                                                                                                    get dlpScanVMs /2.0/dlp/scan/current/vms/{ID}

                                                                                                    Retrieve information about the vm's being scanned

                                                                                                    Secured by basic
                                                                                                    • Request

                                                                                                    URI Parameters

                                                                                                    • ID: required (string)

                                                                                                      Limit filter results by VC MOID of datacenter, cluster, or resource pool

                                                                                                    Query Parameters

                                                                                                    • scanstatus: (string)

                                                                                                      Specify scan status of vm's to be retrieved (all|notstarted|started|completed)

                                                                                                    • pagesize: (string - default: 256)

                                                                                                      Limit max number of entries returned. Valid range is 1-1024

                                                                                                    • startindex: (string)

                                                                                                      Specify starting point for retrieving logs

                                                                                                    dlpScanSummaries /completedscansummaries get

                                                                                                    Retrieve start and end time, total number of vm's scanned, and total number of violations for the last five completed data security scans

                                                                                                    get

                                                                                                    Retrieve scan summaries

                                                                                                    get dlpScanSummaries /2.0/dlp/completedscansummaries

                                                                                                    Retrieve scan summaries

                                                                                                    Secured by basic

                                                                                                        • Request

                                                                                                        Query Parameters

                                                                                                          number of results to view

                                                                                                        • startindex: (string)

                                                                                                          page number from which the results will be displayed

                                                                                                          number of results to view

                                                                                                        • startindex: (string)

                                                                                                          eventControl

                                                                                                          eventControl Operations

                                                                                                          dataCollectionVM /vm/{vmID}/request post

                                                                                                          Enable or disable data collection on a virtual machine

                                                                                                          post

                                                                                                          Enable or disable data collection on a virtual machine

                                                                                                          post dataCollectionVM /1.0/eventcontrol/vm/{vmID}/request

                                                                                                          Enable or disable data collection on a virtual machine

                                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                                          URI Parameters

                                                                                                          • vmID: required (string)

                                                                                                            MOID of the guest vm

                                                                                                          Body

                                                                                                          Type: application/xml

                                                                                                          Schema:

                                                                                                          <perVmConfig>
    <actions>
        <action>
            <type></type>
            <value></value>
        </action>
    </actions>
</perVmConfig>

                                                                                                          dataCollectionKillSwitch /eventcontrol-root/request post

                                                                                                          Data collection kill switch on/off

                                                                                                          post

                                                                                                          Turn on/off data collection at global level

                                                                                                          post dataCollectionKillSwitch /1.0/eventcontrol/eventcontrol-root/request

                                                                                                          Turn on/off data collection at global level

                                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                                          Body

                                                                                                          Type: application/xml

                                                                                                          Schema:

                                                                                                          <request>
    <actions>
        <action>
            <type></type>
            <value></value>
        </action>
    </actions>
</request>

                                                                                                          dataCollectionVMInfo /config/vm/{vmID} get

                                                                                                          Retrieve per vm configuration for data collection

                                                                                                          get

                                                                                                          Retrieve per vm configuration for data collection

                                                                                                          activityMonitoring

                                                                                                          Activity monitoring

                                                                                                          userActivity /records get

                                                                                                          Get aggregated user activity (action records) using parameters. Requires vShield Endpoint and NSX Endpoint configured, and Data collection enabled on 1+ vm's

                                                                                                          get

                                                                                                          Get aggregated user activity

                                                                                                          get userActivity /3.0/ai/records

                                                                                                          Get aggregated user activity

                                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                                          Query Parameters

                                                                                                          • query: required (string - default: resource)

                                                                                                            Name of report (resource,adg,containers,sam,vma)

                                                                                                          • interval: required (string)

                                                                                                            Relative time to current time (number followed by either m,h,d,s)

                                                                                                            Example:

                                                                                                            60m
                                                                                                          • stime: (string - default: 2012-02-28T21:00)

                                                                                                            Start time for query

                                                                                                          • etime: (string - default: 2012-02-29T21:00)

                                                                                                            End time for query

                                                                                                          • param: (string - default: src:SECURITY_GROUP:1:INCLUDE)

                                                                                                            Parameter to be applied to query (:::operator)

                                                                                                          • pagesize: (string - default: 1000)

                                                                                                            Number of records to retrieve (recommended between 100-2000)

                                                                                                          • startindex: (string - default: 100)

                                                                                                            Start record number for pagination

                                                                                                          userDetails /userdetails get

                                                                                                          Retrieve user detail records in accordance with given query parameters

                                                                                                          get

                                                                                                          Retrieve user detail records in accordance with given query parameters

                                                                                                          get userDetails /3.0/ai/userdetails

                                                                                                          Retrieve user detail records in accordance with given query parameters

                                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                                          Query Parameters

                                                                                                          • query: required (string - default: resource)

                                                                                                            Name of report (resource,adg,containers,sam,vma)

                                                                                                          • interval: required (string)

                                                                                                            Relative time to current time (number followed by either m,h,d,s)

                                                                                                            Example:

                                                                                                            60m
                                                                                                          • stime: (string - default: 2012-02-28T21:00)

                                                                                                            Start time for query

                                                                                                          • etime: (string - default: 2012-02-29T21:00)

                                                                                                            End time for query

                                                                                                          • param: (string - default: src:SECURITY_GROUP:1:INCLUDE)

                                                                                                            Parameter to be applied to query (:::operator)

                                                                                                          • pagesize: (string - default: 1000)

                                                                                                            Number of records to retrieve (recommended between 100-2000)

                                                                                                          • startindex: (string - default: 100)

                                                                                                            Start record number for pagination

    <password></password>
</DirectoryDomain>

                                                                                                                          Specified domain

                                                                                                                                    agentConflicts /fabric/sync/conflicts get put

                                                                                                                                    Working with conflicting agencies

                                                                                                                                    get

                                                                                                                                    Retrieve conflicting Deployment Units and EAM Agencies, if any, and the allowed operations on them

                                                                                                                                    put

                                                                                                                                    Create deployment units for conflicting EAM Agencies, delete conflicting EAM agencies, or delete deployment units for conflicting EAM agencies

                                                                                                                                    get agentConflicts /2.0/si/fabric/sync/conflicts

                                                                                                                                    Retrieve conflicting Deployment Units and EAM Agencies, if any, and the allowed operations on them

                                                                                                                                    Secured by basic

                                                                                                                                      put agentConflicts /2.0/si/fabric/sync/conflicts

                                                                                                                                      Create deployment units for conflicting EAM Agencies, delete conflicting EAM agencies, or delete deployment units for conflicting EAM agencies

                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                      macsetScopes

                                                                                                                                      Create or list MACsets on a specified scope

                                                                                                                                      macsetScopes /2.0/services/macset/{scopeId} post get

                                                                                                                                      post

                                                                                                                                      Create a MACset on a specified scope

                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                      List MACsets created on a specified scope

                                                                                                                                      post macsetScopes /2.0/services/macset/{scopeId}

                                                                                                                                      Create a MACset on a specified scope

                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                      • scopeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                        Can be globalroot-0 or datacenterId in upgrade use cases

                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                      <macset>
    <objectId></objectId>
    <type>
        <typeName></typeName>
    </type>
    <description></description> 
    <name></name>
    <revision></revision>
    <objectTypeName></objectTypeName>
    <value></value> 
</macset>

                                                                                                                                      get macsetScopes /2.0/services/macset/{scopeId}

                                                                                                                                      List MACsets created on a specified scope

                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                      • scopeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                        Can be globalroot-0 or datacenterId in upgrade use cases

                                                                                                                                      macset

                                                                                                                                      Operations on an individual MACset

                                                                                                                                      macset /2.0/services/macset/{macsetId} get put delete

                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                      Retrieve details about a MACset

                                                                                                                                      put

                                                                                                                                      Modify an existing MACset

                                                                                                                                      delete

                                                                                                                                      Delete a MACset

                                                                                                                                      get macset /2.0/services/macset/{macsetId}

                                                                                                                                      Retrieve details about a MACset

                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                      • macsetId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                        Specified MACset ID (Can be retrieved by listing the MACset on a scope)

                                                                                                                                      put macset /2.0/services/macset/{macsetId}

                                                                                                                                      Modify an existing MACset

                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                      • macsetId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                        Specified MACset ID (Can be retrieved by listing the MACset on a scope)

                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                      <macset>
    <objectId></objectId>
    <type>
        <typeName></typeName>
    </type>
    <description></description> 
    <name></name>
    <revision></revision>
    <objectTypeName></objectTypeName>
    <value></value> 
</macset>

                                                                                                                                      delete macset /2.0/services/macset/{macsetId}

                                                                                                                                      Delete a MACset

                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                      • macsetId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                        Specified MACset ID (Can be retrieved by listing the MACset on a scope)

                                                                                                                                      Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                      • force: (boolean)

                                                                                                                                        Indicates forced or unforced delete. With forced delete, the object is deleted even if used in other places such as firewall rules, causing invalid referrals. For unforced delete, the object is deleted only if it is no used by other configurations; otherwise the delete fails

                                                                                                                                      taskFramework

                                                                                                                                      Working with filtering criteria and paging information for jobs on the task framework

                                                                                                                                      taskFramework /2.0/services/taskservice/job get

                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                      Query job instances by criterion

                                                                                                                                      get taskFramework /2.0/services/taskservice/job

                                                                                                                                      Query job instances by criterion

                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                      Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                      • startIndex: (integer)

                                                                                                                                        Start index (0 by default)

                                                                                                                                      • pageSize: (integer)

                                                                                                                                        Page size (10 by default)

                                                                                                                                      • sortBy: (string)

                                                                                                                                        Always sorted by "startTime"

                                                                                                                                      • sortOrderAscending: (boolean)

                                                                                                                                        Sort in ascending order of start time (true/false)

                                                                                                                                      taskFrameworkJobs /{jobId} get

                                                                                                                                      Job instances on the task framework

                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                      Retrieve all job instances for the specified job ID

                                                                                                                                      get taskFrameworkJobs /2.0/services/taskservice/job/{jobId}

                                                                                                                                      Retrieve all job instances for the specified job ID

                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                      URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                      • jobId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                        Specified job Id

                                                                                                                                        vShieldSolutionInfo /{altitude} get delete

                                                                                                                                        Solution registration information

                                                                                                                                        get

                                                                                                                                        Get registration information for a given solution

                                                                                                                                        delete

                                                                                                                                        Unregister a solution

                                                                                                                                        get vShieldSolutionInfo /2.0/endpointsecurity/registration/{vendorID}/{altitude}

                                                                                                                                        Get registration information for a given solution

                                                                                                                                        Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                        • Request

                                                                                                                                        URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                        • vendorID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                          VMware-assigned ID for the vendor

                                                                                                                                        • altitude: required (string)

                                                                                                                                          VMware-assigned number to uniquely identify a solution. Describes the type of solution and the order in which the solution receives events relative to other solutions on the same host

                                                                                                                                        delete vShieldSolutionInfo /2.0/endpointsecurity/registration/{vendorID}/{altitude}

                                                                                                                                        Unregister a solution

                                                                                                                                        Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                        • Request

                                                                                                                                        URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                        • vendorID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                          VMware-assigned ID for the vendor

                                                                                                                                        • altitude: required (string)

                                                                                                                                          VMware-assigned number to uniquely identify a solution. Describes the type of solution and the order in which the solution receives events relative to other solutions on the same host

                                                                                                                                        solutionIPPort /location post delete

                                                                                                                                        IP address and port for a solution

                                                                                                                                        post

                                                                                                                                        Set a solution's IP address and port on the vNIC host

                                                                                                                                        delete

                                                                                                                                        Unset a solution's IP address and port

                                                                                                                                        post solutionIPPort /2.0/endpointsecurity/registration/{vendorID}/{altitude}/location

                                                                                                                                        Set a solution's IP address and port on the vNIC host

                                                                                                                                        Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                        • Request

                                                                                                                                        URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                        • vendorID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                          VMware-assigned ID for the vendor

                                                                                                                                        • altitude: required (string)

                                                                                                                                          VMware-assigned number to uniquely identify a solution. Describes the type of solution and the order in which the solution receives events relative to other solutions on the same host

                                                                                                                                        Body

                                                                                                                                        Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                        Schema:

                                                                                                                                        <LocationInfo>
    <ip></ip>
    <port></port>
</LocationInfo>

                                                                                                                                        delete solutionIPPort /2.0/endpointsecurity/registration/{vendorID}/{altitude}/location

                                                                                                                                        Unset a solution's IP address and port

                                                                                                                                        Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                        • Request

                                                                                                                                        URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                        • vendorID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                          VMware-assigned ID for the vendor

                                                                                                                                        • altitude: required (string)

                                                                                                                                          VMware-assigned number to uniquely identify a solution. Describes the type of solution and the order in which the solution receives events relative to other solutions on the same host

                                                                                                                                        solutionActivationStatus /{moid} get

                                                                                                                                        Solution activation status, given the managed object reference of its virtual machine

                                                                                                                                        Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                        • Request

                                                                                                                                        URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                        • vendorID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                          VMware-assigned ID for the vendor

                                                                                                                                        • altitude: required (string)

                                                                                                                                          VMware-assigned number to uniquely identify a solution. Describes the type of solution and the order in which the solution receives events relative to other solutions on the same host

                                                                                                                                        • moid: required (string)

                                                                                                                                          managed object reference

                                                                                                                                        vShieldSolutionActivation
