                                                                                                                                            Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

                                                                                                                                          Body

                                                                                                                                          Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                          layer3RedirectSections /layer3redirectsections post

                                                                                                                                          Layer3 redirect sections and rules

                                                                                                                                          post

                                                                                                                                          Add L3 redirect section

                                                                                                                                          post layer3RedirectSections /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirectsections

                                                                                                                                          Add L3 redirect section

                                                                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                                                                          Body

                                                                                                                                          Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                          Schema:

                                                                                                                                          <section>
    <name></name>
    <action></action>
    <appliedToList>
        <appliedTo>
            <name></name>
            <value></value>
            <type></type>
            <isValid></isValid>
        </appliedTo>
    </appliedToList>
    <sectionId></sectionId>
</section>

                                                                                                                                          section /{section} get put delete

                                                                                                                                          Layer3 redirect section

                                                                                                                                          get

                                                                                                                                          Get L3 redirect section configuration

                                                                                                                                          put

                                                                                                                                          Modify L3 Redirect section. You will need to get the Etag value out of the GET first. Then pass the modified version of the whole redirect section configuration in the GET body

                                                                                                                                          delete

                                                                                                                                          Delete specified L3 redirect section

                                                                                                                                          get section /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirectsections/{section}

                                                                                                                                          Get L3 redirect section configuration

                                                                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                                                                          URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                          • section: required (string)

                                                                                                                                            Specify section by ID or name

                                                                                                                                          put section /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirectsections/{section}

                                                                                                                                          Modify L3 Redirect section. You will need to get the Etag value out of the GET first. Then pass the modified version of the whole redirect section configuration in the GET body

                                                                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                                                                          URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                          • section: required (string)

                                                                                                                                            Specify section by ID or name

                                                                                                                                          Headers

                                                                                                                                          • if-match: required (string)

                                                                                                                                            Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

                                                                                                                                          Body

                                                                                                                                          Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                          Schema:

                                                                                                                                          <section id="" name="" generationNumber="" timestamp="">
    <rule id="" disabled="" logged="">
        <name></name>
        <action></action>
        <appliedToList>
            <appliedTo>
                <name></name>
                <value></value>
                <type></type>
                <isValid></isValid>
            </appliedTo>
        </appliedToList>
        <sectionId></sectionId>
    </rule>
</section>

                                                                                                                                          delete section /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirectsections/{section}

                                                                                                                                          Delete specified L3 redirect section

                                                                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                                                                          URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                          • section: required (string)

                                                                                                                                            Specify section by ID or name

                                                                                                                                          rules /rules post

                                                                                                                                          L3 redirect rules for specified section

                                                                                                                                          post

                                                                                                                                          Add L3 redirect rule

                                                                                                                                          post rules /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirectsections/{section}/rules

                                                                                                                                          Add L3 redirect rule

                                                                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                                                                          URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                          • section: required (string)

                                                                                                                                            Specify section by ID or name

                                                                                                                                          Body

                                                                                                                                          Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                          Schema:

                                                                                                                                          <section id="" name="" generationNumber="" timestamp="">
    <name></name>
    <action></action>
    <appliedToList>
        <appliedTo>
            <name></name>
            <value></value>
            <type></type>
            <isValid></isValid>
        </appliedTo>
    </appliedToList>
    <sectionId></sectionId>
</section>

                                                                                                                                          rule /{ruleID} get put delete

                                                                                                                                          Rule for specified section

                                                                                                                                          get

                                                                                                                                          Get L3 redirect rule

                                                                                                                                          put

                                                                                                                                          Modify L3 redirect rule. You will need Etag value from the response header of GET call. Then, pass Etag value as the if-match header in PUT call

                                                                                                                                          delete

                                                                                                                                          Delete specified L3 redirect rule

                                                                                                                                          get rule /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirectsections/{section}/rules/{ruleID}

                                                                                                                                          Get L3 redirect rule

                                                                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                                                                          URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                          • section: required (string)

                                                                                                                                            Specify section by ID or name

                                                                                                                                          • ruleID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                            Specified redirect rule

                                                                                                                                          put rule /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirectsections/{section}/rules/{ruleID}

                                                                                                                                          Modify L3 redirect rule. You will need Etag value from the response header of GET call. Then, pass Etag value as the if-match header in PUT call

                                                                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                                                                          URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                          • section: required (string)

                                                                                                                                            Specify section by ID or name

                                                                                                                                          • ruleID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                            Specified redirect rule

                                                                                                                                          Headers

                                                                                                                                          • if-match: required (string)

                                                                                                                                            Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

                                                                                                                                          Body

                                                                                                                                          Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                          Schema:

                                                                                                                                          <rule id="" disabled="" logged="">
    <name></name>
    <action></action>
    <appliedToList>
        <appliedTo>
            <name></name>
            <value></value>
            <type></type>
            <isValid></isValid>
        </appliedTo>
    </appliedToList>
</rule>

                                                                                                                                          delete rule /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirectsections/{section}/rules/{ruleID}

                                                                                                                                          Delete specified L3 redirect rule

                                                                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                                                                          URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                          • section: required (string)

                                                                                                                                            Specify section by ID or name

                                                                                                                                          • ruleID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                            Specified redirect rule

                                                                                                                                          serviceInsertionProfiles /layer3redirect/profiles get

                                                                                                                                          Service Insertion profiles that can be applied to layer3 redirect rules

                                                                                                                                          get

                                                                                                                                          Retrieve the Service Insertion profiles

                                                                                                                                          get serviceInsertionProfiles /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirect/profiles

                                                                                                                                          Retrieve the Service Insertion profiles

                                                                                                                                          Secured by basic

                                                                                                                                            dfwUpgrade /globalroot-0/state get put

                                                                                                                                            get

                                                                                                                                            Get current state of firewall functioning after NSX upgrade

                                                                                                                                            put

                                                                                                                                            Enable distributed firewall

                                                                                                                                            get dfwUpgrade /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/state

                                                                                                                                            Get current state of firewall functioning after NSX upgrade

                                                                                                                                            Secured by basic

                                                                                                                                              put dfwUpgrade /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/state

                                                                                                                                              Enable distributed firewall

                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic

                                                                                                                                                dfwStatus /globalroot-0/status get

                                                                                                                                                get dfwStatus /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/status

                                                                                                                                                Secured by basic

                                                                                                                                                  dfwDrafts /globalroot-0/drafts post get

                                                                                                                                                  Import and export firewall configurations

                                                                                                                                                  post

                                                                                                                                                  Save a firewall configuration

                                                                                                                                                  get

                                                                                                                                                  Displays the draft IDs of all saved configurations

                                                                                                                                                  post dfwDrafts /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/drafts

                                                                                                                                                  Save a firewall configuration

                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                  • Request

                                                                                                                                                  Body

                                                                                                                                                  Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                  Schema:

                                                                                                                                                  <firewallDraft name="">
    <description></description>
    <preserve></preserve>
    <mode></mode>
    <config>
        <contextId></contextId>
        <layer3Sections>
            <section name="" >
                <rule id="" disabled="true|false" logged="true|false">
                    <name></name>
                    <action></action>
                    <precedence></precedence>
                </rule>
            </section>
        </layer3Sections>
        <layer2Sections>
            <section name="">
                <rule id="" disabled="true|false" logged="true|false">
                    <name></name>
                    <action></action>
                    <precedence></precedence>
                </rule>
            </section>
        </layer2Sections>
    </config>
</firewallDraft>

                                                                                                                                                  get dfwDrafts /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/drafts

                                                                                                                                                  Displays the draft IDs of all saved configurations

                                                                                                                                                  Secured by basic

                                                                                                                                                    dfwDraft /{draftID} get put delete

                                                                                                                                                    Specified saved firewall configuration

                                                                                                                                                    get

                                                                                                                                                    Get a saved firewall configuration

                                                                                                                                                    put

                                                                                                                                                    Update a saved firewall configuration

                                                                                                                                                    delete

                                                                                                                                                    Delete a configuration

                                                                                                                                                    get dfwDraft /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/drafts/{draftID}

                                                                                                                                                    Get a saved firewall configuration

                                                                                                                                                    Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                    • Request

                                                                                                                                                    URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                    • draftID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                      Specified draft ID (retrieved through dfwDrafts GET call)

                                                                                                                                                    put dfwDraft /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/drafts/{draftID}

                                                                                                                                                    Update a saved firewall configuration

                                                                                                                                                    Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                    • Request

                                                                                                                                                    URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                    • draftID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                      Specified draft ID (retrieved through dfwDrafts GET call)

                                                                                                                                                    Body

                                                                                                                                                    Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                    Schema:

                                                                                                                                                    <firewallDraft name="">
    <description></description>
    <preserve></preserve>
    <mode></mode>
    <config>
        <contextId></contextId>
        <layer3Sections>
            <section name="" >
                <rule id="" disabled="true|false" logged="true|false">
                    <name></name>
                    <action></action>
                    <precedence></precedence>
                </rule>
            </section>
        </layer3Sections>
        <layer2Sections>
            <section name="">
                <rule id="" disabled="true|false" logged="true|false">
                    <name></name>
                    <action></action>
                    <precedence></precedence>
                </rule>
            </section>
        </layer2Sections>
    </config>
</firewallDraft>

                                                                                                                                                    delete dfwDraft /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/drafts/{draftID}

                                                                                                                                                    Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                    • Request

                                                                                                                                                    URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                    • draftID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                      Specified draft ID (retrieved through dfwDrafts GET call)

                                                                                                                                                    dfwConfigExport /action/export get

                                                                                                                                                    Export a configuration

                                                                                                                                                    get

                                                                                                                                                    Export a configuration

                                                                                                                                                    get dfwConfigExport /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/drafts/{draftID}/action/export

                                                                                                                                                    Export a configuration

                                                                                                                                                    Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                    • Request

                                                                                                                                                    URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                    • draftID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                      Specified draft ID (retrieved through dfwDrafts GET call)

                                                                                                                                                    dfwConfigImport /action/import post

                                                                                                                                                    Import a configuration

                                                                                                                                                    post

                                                                                                                                                    Import a configuration

                                                                                                                                                    post dfwConfigImport /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/drafts/{draftID}/action/import

                                                                                                                                                    Import a configuration

                                                                                                                                                    Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                    • Request

                                                                                                                                                    URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                    • draftID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                      Specified draft ID (retrieved through dfwDrafts GET call)

                                                                                                                                                    Body

                                                                                                                                                    Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                    Schema:

                                                                                                                                                    <firewallDraft id="" name="" timestamp="">
    <description></description>
    <preserve></preserve>
    <user></user>
    <mode></mode>
    <config timestamp="">
        <contextId></contextId>
        <layer3Sections>
            <section name="" timestamp="">
                <rule id="" disabled="true|false" logged="true|false">
                    <name></name>
                    <action></action>
                    <precedence></precedence>
                </rule>
            </section>
        </layer3Sections>
        <layer2Sections>
            <section name="" timestamp="">
                <rule id="" disabled="true|false" logged="true|false">
                    <name></name>
                    <action></action>
                    <precedence></precedence>
                </rule>
            </section>
        </layer2Sections>
        <generationNumber></generationNumber>
    </config>
</firewallDraft>

                                                                                                                                                    dfwThresholds /stats/eventthresholds get put

                                                                                                                                                    Memory and CPU thresholds for firewall

                                                                                                                                                    get

                                                                                                                                                    Retrieve memory, CPU, and CPS thresholds for firewall

                                                                                                                                                    put

                                                                                                                                                    Configure thresholds

                                                                                                                                                    get dfwThresholds /4.0/firewall/stats/eventthresholds

                                                                                                                                                    Retrieve memory, CPU, and CPS thresholds for firewall

                                                                                                                                                    Secured by basic

                                                                                                                                                      put dfwThresholds /4.0/firewall/stats/eventthresholds

                                                                                                                                                      Configure thresholds

                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                      • Request

                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                      Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                      Schema:

                                                                                                                                                      <eventThresholds>
    <cpu>
        <percentValue></percentValue>
    </cpu>
    <memory>
        <percentValue></percentValue>
    </memory>
    <connectionsPerSecond>
        <value></value>
    </connectionsPerSecond>
</eventThresholds>

                                                                                                                                                      dfwPerformance /config/globalconfiguration get put

                                                                                                                                                      Tuning firewall performance

                                                                                                                                                      get

                                                                                                                                                      Query RuleOptimize and TCPStrict flags

                                                                                                                                                      put

                                                                                                                                                      Set RuleOptimize and TCPStrict flags in body to improve performance

                                                                                                                                                      get dfwPerformance /4.0/firewall/config/globalconfiguration

                                                                                                                                                      Query RuleOptimize and TCPStrict flags

                                                                                                                                                      Secured by basic

                                                                                                                                                        put dfwPerformance /4.0/firewall/config/globalconfiguration

                                                                                                                                                        Set RuleOptimize and TCPStrict flags in body to improve performance

                                                                                                                                                        Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                        • Request

                                                                                                                                                        Body

                                                                                                                                                        Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                        Schema:

                                                                                                                                                        <globalConfiguration>
    <layer3RuleOptimize></layer3RuleOptimize>
    <layer2RuleOptimize></layer2RuleOptimize>
    <tcpStrictOption></tcpStrictOption>
</globalConfiguration>

                                                                                                                                                        dfwSync /forceSync/{ID} post

                                                                                                                                                        post dfwSync /4.0/firewall/forceSync/{ID}

                                                                                                                                                        Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                        • Request

                                                                                                                                                        URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                        • ID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                          Specified host or cluster to synchronize

                                                                                                                                                        dfwEnableDisableAPI /{domainID}/enable/{truefalse} post

                                                                                                                                                        Enable or disable firewall components on a cluster

                                                                                                                                                        post

                                                                                                                                                        Enable or disable firewall components on a cluster

                                                                                                                                                        post dfwEnableDisableAPI /4.0/firewall/{domainID}/enable/{truefalse}

                                                                                                                                                        Enable or disable firewall components on a cluster

                                                                                                                                                        Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                        • Request

                                                                                                                                                        URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                        • domainID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                          Specified cluster

                                                                                                                                                        • truefalse: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                          Set parameter to true/false to enable/disable

                                                                                                                                                        dfwIPFix /{contextId}/config/ipfix get put delete

                                                                                                                                                        Export specific flows directly from firewall to a flow collector

                                                                                                                                                        get

                                                                                                                                                        Query IPFix configuration

                                                                                                                                                        put

                                                                                                                                                        Configure IPFix

                                                                                                                                                        delete

                                                                                                                                                        Deleting IPFix configuration resets the config to default values

                                                                                                                                                        get dfwIPFix /4.0/firewall/{contextId}/config/ipfix

                                                                                                                                                        Query IPFix configuration

                                                                                                                                                        Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                        • Request

                                                                                                                                                        URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                        • contextId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                          Specified context

                                                                                                                                                        put dfwIPFix /4.0/firewall/{contextId}/config/ipfix

                                                                                                                                                        Configure IPFix

                                                                                                                                                        Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                        • Request

                                                                                                                                                        URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                        • contextId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                          Specified context

                                                                                                                                                        Body

                                                                                                                                                        Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                        Schema:

                                                                                                                                                        <ipfixConfiguration>
    <contextId></contextId>
    <ipfixEnabled></ipfixEnabled>
    <observationDomainId></observationDomainId>
    <flowTimeout></flowTimeout>
    <collector>
        <ip></ip>
        <port></port>
    </collector>
</ipfixConfiguration>

                                                                                                                                                        delete dfwIPFix /4.0/firewall/{contextId}/config/ipfix

                                                                                                                                                        Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                        • Request

                                                                                                                                                        URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                        • contextId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                          Specified context

                                                                                                                                                        spoofGuardPolicies

                                                                                                                                                        SpoofGuard policies

                                                                                                                                                        spoofGuardPolicies /4.0/services/spoofguard/policies post get

                                                                                                                                                        post

                                                                                                                                                        Create a SpoofGuard policy to specify the operation mode for networks.

                                                                                                                                                        get

                                                                                                                                                        Retrieve all SpoofGuard policies

                                                                                                                                                        post spoofGuardPolicies /4.0/services/spoofguard/policies

                                                                                                                                                        Create a SpoofGuard policy to specify the operation mode for networks.

                                                                                                                                                        Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                        • Request

                                                                                                                                                        Body

                                                                                                                                                        Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                        Schema:

                                                                                                                                                        <spoofguardPolicy>
    <name></name>
    <description></description>
    <operationMode></operationMode>
    <enforcementPoint>
        <id></id>
        <name></name>
        <type></type>
    </enforcementPoint>
    <allowLocalIPs></allowLocalIPs>
</spoofguardPolicy>

                                                                                                                                                        get spoofGuardPolicies /4.0/services/spoofguard/policies

                                                                                                                                                        Retrieve all SpoofGuard policies

                                                                                                                                                        Secured by basic

                                                                                                                                                          spoofGuardPolicy /{policyID} post get put delete

                                                                                                                                                          Specified policy

                                                                                                                                                          post

                                                                                                                                                          Use query parameters to perform operations on a policy

                                                                                                                                                          get

                                                                                                                                                          Retrieve policy information, or use the query parameters to perform operations

                                                                                                                                                          put

                                                                                                                                                          Modify SpoofGuard policy

                                                                                                                                                          delete

                                                                                                                                                          Delete a policy

                                                                                                                                                          post spoofGuardPolicy /4.0/services/spoofguard/policies/{policyID}

                                                                                                                                                          Use query parameters to perform operations on a policy

                                                                                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                                                                                          URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                          • policyID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                          Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                          • action: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                            set to "approve" along with specified IP addresses in body to approve them, or set to "publish" to publish the approved IP addresses

                                                                                                                                                          Body

                                                                                                                                                          Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                          Schema:

                                                                                                                                                          <spoofguardList>
    <spoofguard>
        <id></id>
        <vnicUuid></vnicUuid>
        <approvedIpAddress>
            <ipAddress></ipAddress>
        </approvedIpAddress>
        <approvedMacAddress></approvedMacAddress>
        <approvedBy></approvedBy>
        <approvedOn></approvedOn>
        <publishedIpAddress>
            <ipAddress></ipAddress>
        </publishedIpAddress>
        <publishedMacAddress></publishedMacAddress>
        <publishedBy></publishedBy>
        <publishedOn></publishedOn>
    </spoofguard>
</spoofguardList>

                                                                                                                                                          get spoofGuardPolicy /4.0/services/spoofguard/policies/{policyID}

                                                                                                                                                          Retrieve policy information, or use the query parameters to perform operations

                                                                                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                                                                                          URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                          • policyID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                          Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                          • list: (string)

                                                                                                                                                            Use to retrieve IP addresses for specified state (ACTIVE|INACTIVE|PUBLISHED|UNPUBLISHED|REVIEW_PENDING|DUPLICATE)

                                                                                                                                                          put spoofGuardPolicy /4.0/services/spoofguard/policies/{policyID}

                                                                                                                                                          Modify SpoofGuard policy

                                                                                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                                                                                          URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                          • policyID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                          Body

                                                                                                                                                          Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                          Schema:

                                                                                                                                                          <spoofguardPolicy>
    <policyId></policyId>
    <name></name>
    <description></description>
    <operationMode></operationMode>
    <enforcementPoint>
        <id></id>
        <name></name>
        <type></type>
    </enforcementPoint>
    <allowLocalIPs></allowLocalIPs>
</spoofguardPolicy>

                                                                                                                                                          delete spoofGuardPolicy /4.0/services/spoofguard/policies/{policyID}

                                                                                                                                                          Delete a policy

                                                                                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                                                                                          URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                          • policyID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                          flowStats

                                                                                                                                                          Retrieve flow statistics for a datacenter, port group, VM, or vNIC

                                                                                                                                                          flowStats /2.1/flow/flowstats get

                                                                                                                                                          get

                                                                                                                                                          Retrieve flow statistics for a datacenter, port group, VM, or vNIC

                                                                                                                                                          get flowStats /2.1/flow/flowstats

                                                                                                                                                          Retrieve flow statistics for a datacenter, port group, VM, or vNIC

                                                                                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                                                                                          Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                          • contextId: (string)

                                                                                                                                                            vc-moref-id of the datacenter, portgroup, vm, or UUID of the vNIC for which traffic flow is to be retrieved

                                                                                                                                                          • flowType: (string)

                                                                                                                                                            Type of flow to be retrieved (TCP_UDP|LAYER2|LAYER3)

                                                                                                                                                          • startTime: (string)

                                                                                                                                                            Flows with start time greater than specified time are retrieved

                                                                                                                                                          • endTime: (string)

                                                                                                                                                            Flows with start time lower than specified time are retrieved

                                                                                                                                                          • startIndex: (integer)

                                                                                                                                                            (optional) Specifies starting point for retrieval. If not specified, start from the beginning by default

                                                                                                                                                          • pageSize: (integer - default: 256)

                                                                                                                                                            (optional) Limit the max number of entries returned. Valid range is 1-1024

                                                                                                                                                          flowData

                                                                                                                                                          Operations on flowdata

                                                                                                                                                          flowSummary /flowsummary get

                                                                                                                                                          Flow summary for given context

                                                                                                                                                          get

                                                                                                                                                          Retrieve flow summary

                                                                                                                                                          get flowSummary /2.1/internal/flow/flowsummary

                                                                                                                                                          Retrieve flow summary

                                                                                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                                                                                          Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                          • contextId: (string)

                                                                                                                                                            vc-moref-id of datacenter, port group, vm, or uuid of vNIC for which flow is to be retrieved

                                                                                                                                                          • startTime: (string)

                                                                                                                                                            Flows with start time greater than specified will be fetched

                                                                                                                                                          • endTime: (string)

                                                                                                                                                            Flows with end time lesser than specified will be fetched

                                                                                                                                                          flowTable /flowtable get

                                                                                                                                                          Retrieve flow table for given context and table type

                                                                                                                                                          get

                                                                                                                                                          Retrieve flow table for given context and table type

                                                                                                                                                          get flowTable /2.1/internal/flow/flowtable

                                                                                                                                                          Retrieve flow table for given context and table type

                                                                                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                                                                                          Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                          • contextId: (string)

                                                                                                                                                            vc-moref-id of datacenter, port group, vm, or uuid of vNIC for which flow is to be retrieved

                                                                                                                                                          • startTime: (string)

                                                                                                                                                            Flows with start time greater than specified will be fetched

                                                                                                                                                          • endTime: (string)

                                                                                                                                                            Flows with end time lesser than specified will be fetched

                                                                                                                                                          • tableType: (string)

                                                                                                                                                            Type of flow to be fetched (source|application|destination)

                                                                                                                                                          • maxRows: (string - default: 5)

                                                                                                                                                            (optional) Max number of rows to return

                                                                                                                                                          flowDetails /flowdetails get

                                                                                                                                                          Retrieve flow details for given context
