                                                                                                                                                          get

                                                                                                                                                          Retrieve flow details for given context

                                                                                                                                                          get flowDetails /2.1/internal/flow/flowdetails

                                                                                                                                                          Retrieve flow details for given context

                                                                                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                                                                                          Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                          • contextId: (string)

                                                                                                                                                            vc-moref-id of datacenter, port group, vm, or uuid of vNIC for which flow is to be retrieved

                                                                                                                                                          • startTime: (string)

                                                                                                                                                            Flows with start time greater than specified will be fetched

                                                                                                                                                          • endTime: (string)

                                                                                                                                                            Flows with end time lesser than specified will be fetched

                                                                                                                                                          • flowType: (string)

                                                                                                                                                            Type of flow to be fetched (Allowed|Blocked)

                                                                                                                                                          flowDetailsApp /application get

                                                                                                                                                          Retrieve flow details for given context by application

                                                                                                                                                          get

                                                                                                                                                          Retrieve flow details for given context by application

                                                                                                                                                          get flowDetailsApp /2.1/internal/flow/flowdetails/application

                                                                                                                                                          Retrieve flow details for given context by application

                                                                                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                                                                                          Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                          • contextId: (string)

                                                                                                                                                            vc-moref-id of datacenter, port group, vm, or uuid of vNIC for which flow is to be retrieved

                                                                                                                                                          • startTime: (string)

                                                                                                                                                            Flows with start time greater than specified will be fetched

                                                                                                                                                          • endTime: (string)

                                                                                                                                                            Flows with end time lesser than specified will be fetched

                                                                                                                                                          • flowType: (string)

                                                                                                                                                            Type of flow to be fetched (Allowed|Blocked)

                                                                                                                                                          • serviceId: (string)

                                                                                                                                                            Service identifier of application to be queried

                                                                                                                                                          flowPagedDetails /pagedflowdetails get

                                                                                                                                                          Retrieves paged flow details for given context

                                                                                                                                                          get

                                                                                                                                                          Retrieves paged flow details for given context

                                                                                                                                                          get flowPagedDetails /2.1/internal/flow/pagedflowdetails

                                                                                                                                                          Retrieves paged flow details for given context

                                                                                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                                                                                          Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                          • contextId: (string)

                                                                                                                                                            vc-moref-id of datacenter, port group, vm, or uuid of vNIC for which flow is to be retrieved

                                                                                                                                                          • startTime: (string)

                                                                                                                                                            Flows with start time greater than specified will be fetched

                                                                                                                                                          • endTime: (string)

                                                                                                                                                            Flows with end time lesser than specified will be fetched

                                                                                                                                                          • flowType: (string)

                                                                                                                                                            Type of flow to be fetched (Allowed|Blocked)

                                                                                                                                                          • startIndex: (string)

                                                                                                                                                            (optional) Start index for returned flows

                                                                                                                                                          • pageSize: (string - default: 256)

                                                                                                                                                            (optional) Max number of flows to return in a single call

                                                                                                                                                          flowPagedDetailsApp /application get

                                                                                                                                                          Retrieve paged flow details by application

                                                                                                                                                          get

                                                                                                                                                          Retrieve paged flow details by application

                                                                                                                                                          get flowPagedDetailsApp /2.1/internal/flow/pagedflowdetails/application

                                                                                                                                                          Retrieve paged flow details by application

                                                                                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                                                                                          Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                          • contextId: (string)

                                                                                                                                                            vc-moref-id of datacenter, port group, vm, or uuid of vNIC for which flow is to be retrieved

                                                                                                                                                          • startTime: (string)

                                                                                                                                                            Flows with start time greater than specified will be fetched

                                                                                                                                                          • endTime: (string)

                                                                                                                                                            Flows with end time lesser than specified will be fetched

                                                                                                                                                          • flowType: (string)

                                                                                                                                                            Type of flow to be fetched (Allowed|Blocked)

                                                                                                                                                          • startIndex: (string)

                                                                                                                                                            (optional) Start index for returned flows

                                                                                                                                                          • pageSize: (string - default: 256)

                                                                                                                                                            (optional) Max number of flows to return in a single call

                                                                                                                                                          • serviceId: (string)

                                                                                                                                                            Service identifier of application to query

                                                                                                                                                          flowsExclude /config post get

                                                                                                                                                          Exclude specified flows

                                                                                                                                                          post

                                                                                                                                                          Exclude specified flows

                                                                                                                                                          get

                                                                                                                                                          Retrieve excluded flow details

                                                                                                                                                          post flowsExclude /2.1/internal/flow/config

                                                                                                                                                          Exclude specified flows

                                                                                                                                                          Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                          • Request

                                                                                                                                                          Body

                                                                                                                                                          Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                          Schema:

                                                                                                                                                          <FlowConfiguration>
    <collectFlows>true|false</collectFlows>
    <ignoreBlockedFlows>true|false</ignoreBlockedFlows>
    <ignoreLayer2Flows>true|false</ignoreLayer2Flows>
    <sourceIPs>mandatory</sourceIPs>
    <sourceContainer>
        <name>mandatory</name>
        <id>mandatory</id>
        <type>mandatory</type>
    </sourceContainer>
    <destinationIPs>mandatory</destinationIPs>
    <destinationContainer>
        <name>mandatory</name>
        <id>mandatory</id>
        <type>mandatory</type>
    </destinationContainer>
    <destinationPorts>mandatory</destinationPorts>
    <service>
        <name>mandatory</name>
        <id>mandatory</id>
    </service>
</FlowConfiguration>

                                                                                                                                                          get flowsExclude /2.1/internal/flow/config

                                                                                                                                                          Retrieve excluded flow details

                                                                                                                                                          Secured by basic

                                                                                                                                                            dfwExclusion

                                                                                                                                                            Exclude VM's from firewall protection

                                                                                                                                                            dfwExclusion /2.1/app/excludelist get

                                                                                                                                                            get

                                                                                                                                                            Retrieve the set of vm's in the exclusion list

                                                                                                                                                            get dfwExclusion /2.1/app/excludelist

                                                                                                                                                            Retrieve the set of vm's in the exclusion list

                                                                                                                                                            Secured by basic

                                                                                                                                                              dfwExcludeMember /{memberID} put delete

                                                                                                                                                              Exclude VM's from firewall protection

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Add a vm to the exclusion list

                                                                                                                                                              delete

                                                                                                                                                              Delete a vm from exclusion list

                                                                                                                                                              put dfwExcludeMember /2.1/app/excludelist/{memberID}

                                                                                                                                                              Add a vm to the exclusion list

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • memberID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                vc-moref-id of a virtual machine

                                                                                                                                                              delete dfwExcludeMember /2.1/app/excludelist/{memberID}

                                                                                                                                                              Delete a vm from exclusion list

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • memberID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                vc-moref-id of a virtual machine

                                                                                                                                                              nsxEdges

                                                                                                                                                              Installed NSX Edges in your inventory

                                                                                                                                                              nsxEdges /4.0/edges post get

                                                                                                                                                              post

                                                                                                                                                              Install NSX Edge services gateway or logical router, depending on request body

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve a list of NSX Edges in your inventory or use the query parameters to filter results by datacenter or port group

                                                                                                                                                              post nsxEdges /4.0/edges

                                                                                                                                                              Install NSX Edge services gateway or logical router, depending on request body

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <edge>
    <datacenterMoid></datacenterMoid>
    <name></name>
    <description></description>
    <tenant></tenant>
    <fqdn></fqdn>
    <vseLogLevel></vseLogLevel>
    <enableAesni></enableAesni>
    <enableFips></enableFips>
    <appliances>
        <applianceSize></applianceSize>
        <enableCoreDump></enableCoreDump>
        <appliance>
            <resourcePoolId></resourcePoolId>
            <datastoreId></datastoreId>
            <hostId></hostId>
            <vmFolderId></vmFolderId>
            <customField>
                <key></key>
                <value></value>
            </customField>
            <cpuReservation>
                <limit></limit>
                <reservation></reservation>
                <shares></shares>
            </cpuReservation>
            <memoryReservation>
                <limit></limit>
                <reservation></reservation>
                <shares></shares>
            </memoryReservation>
        </appliance>
    </appliances>
    <vnics> 
        <vnic>
            <index></index>
            <name></name>
            <type></type>
            <portgroupId></portgroupId>
            <addressGroups>
                <addressGroup>
                    <primaryAddress></primaryAddress>
                    <secondaryAddresses>
                        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
                    </secondaryAddresses>
                    <subnetMask></subnetMask>
                </addressGroup>
            </addressGroups>
            <macAddress>
                <edgeVmHaIndex></edgeVmHaIndex>
                <value></value>
            </macAddress>
            <fenceParameter>
                <key></key>
                <value></value>
            </fenceParameter>
            <mtu></mtu>
            <enableProxyArp></enableProxyArp>
            <enableSendRedirects></enableSendRedirects>
            <isConnected></isConnected>
            <inShapingPolicy>
                <averageBandwidth></averageBandwidth>
                <peakBandwidth></peakBandwidth>
                <burstSize></burstSize>
                <enabled></enabled>
                <inherited></inherited>
            </inShapingPolicy>
            <outShapingPolicy>
                <averageBandwidth></averageBandwidth>
                <peakBandwidth></peakBandwidth>
                <burstSize></burstSize>
                <enabled></enabled>
                <inherited></inherited>
            </outShapingPolicy>
        </vnic>
    </vnics>
    <cliSettings>
        <userName></userName>
        <password></password>
        <remoteAccess></remoteAccess>
    </cliSettings>
    <autoConfiguration>
        <enabled></enabled>
        <rulePriority></rulePriority>
    </autoConfiguration>
    <dnsClient>
        <primaryDns></primaryDns>
        <secondaryDns></secondaryDns>
        <domainName></domainName>
    </dnsClient>
    <queryDaemon>
        <enabled></enabled>
        <port></port>
    </queryDaemon>
</edge>

                                                                                                                                                              get nsxEdges /4.0/edges

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve a list of NSX Edges in your inventory or use the query parameters to filter results by datacenter or port group

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • datacenter: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Retrieve Edges by datacenter MoId

                                                                                                                                                              • tenant: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Retrieve Edges on specified tenant (by tenant ID)

                                                                                                                                                              • pg: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Retrieve Edges with one interface on specified port group (by port group MoId)

                                                                                                                                                              nsxEdge /{edgeId} post get put delete

                                                                                                                                                              NSX Edge operations

                                                                                                                                                              post

                                                                                                                                                              Manage NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve Edge details

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Update the NSX Edge configuration

                                                                                                                                                              delete

                                                                                                                                                              Delete specified Edge from database. Associated appliances are also deleted

                                                                                                                                                              post nsxEdge /4.0/edges/{edgeId}

                                                                                                                                                              Manage NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • action: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Options include "forcesync" (resync Edge vm's), "redeploy" ()

                                                                                                                                                              get nsxEdge /4.0/edges/{edgeId}

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve Edge details

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              put nsxEdge /4.0/edges/{edgeId}

                                                                                                                                                              Update the NSX Edge configuration

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <edge>
    <id></id>
    <description></description>
    <datacenterMoid></datacenterMoid>
    <name></name>
    <fqdn></fqdn>
    <enableAesni></enableAesni>
    <enableFips></enableFips>
    <vseLogLevel></vseLogLevel>
    <vnics>
        <vnic>
            <index></index>
            <name></name>
            <type></type>
            <portgroupId></portgroupId>
            <addressGroups>
                <addressGroup>
                    <primaryAddress></primaryAddress>
                    <secondaryAddresses>
                        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
                    </secondaryAddresses>
                    <subnetMask></subnetMask>
                </addressGroup>
            <addressGroup>
            <mtu></mtu>
            <enableProxyArp></enableProxyArp>
            <enableSendRedirects></enableSendRedirects>
            <isConnected></isConnected>
            <inShapingPolicy>
                <averageBandwidth></averageBandwidth>
                <peakBandwidth></peakBandwidth>
                <burstSize></burstSize>
                <enabled></enabled>
                <inherited></inherited>
            </inShapingPolicy>
            <outShapingPolicy>
                <averageBandwidth></averageBandwidth>
                <peakBandwidth></peakBandwidth>
                <burstSize></burstSize>
                <enabled></enabled>
                <inherited></inherited>
            </outShapingPolicy>
        </vnic>
    </vnics>
    <appliances>
        <applianceSize></applianceSize>
        <appliance>
            <resourcePoolId></resourcePoolId>
            <datastoreId></datastoreId>
            <vmFolderId></vmFolderId>
        </appliance>
    </appliances>
    <cliSettings>
        <remoteAccess></remoteAccess>
        <userName></userName>
    </cliSettings>
    <features>
        <firewall>
            <defaultPolicy>
                <action></action>
                <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
            </defaultPolicy>
            <rules>
                <rule>
                    <id></id>
                    <ruleTag></ruleTag>
                    <name></name>
                    <ruleType></ruleType>
                    <source>
                        <exclude></exclude>
                        <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
                    </source>
                    <destination><destination/>
                    <application>
                        <applicationId></applicationId>
                    </application>
                    <action></action>
                    <enabled></enabled>
                    <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
                    <matchTranslated></matchTranslated>
                </rule>
            </rules>
        </firewall>
        <routing>
            <staticRouting>
                <defaultRoute>
                    <vnic></vnic>
                    <gatewayAddress></gatewayAddress>
                    <description></description>
                </defaultRoute>
                <staticRoutes>
                    <route>
                        <vnic></vnic>
                        <network></network>
                        <nextHop></nextHop>
                        <type></type>
                    </route>
                </staticRoutes>
            </staticRouting>
            <ospf>
                <enabled></enabled>
            </ospf>
        </routing>
        <highAvailability>
            <enabled></enabled>
            <declareDeadTime></declareDeadTime>
            <logging>
                <enable></enable>
                <logLevel></logLevel>
            </logging>
        </highAvailability>
        <syslog>
            <protocol></protocol>
            <serverAddresses>
                <ipAddress></ipAddress>
                <ipAddress></ipAddress>
            </serverAddresses>
        </syslog>
        <ipsec>
            <enabled></enabled>
            <logging>
                <enable></enable>
                <logLevel></logLevel>
            </logging>
            <sites>
                <site>
                    <enabled></enabled>
                    <name></name>
                    <localId></localId>
                    <localIp></localIp>
                    <peerId></peerId>
                    <encryptionAlgorithm></encryptionAlgorithm>
                    <mtu></mtu>
                    <enablePfs></enablePfs>
                    <dhGroup></dhGroup>
                    <localSubnets>
                        <subnet></subnet>
                    </localSubnets>
                    <peerSubnets>
                        <subnet></subnet>
                    </peerSubnets>
                    <psk></psk>
                    <authenticationMode></authenticationMode>
                </site>
            </sites>
            <global>
                <caCertificates/>
                <crlCertificates/>
            </global>
        </ipsec>
        <dhcp>
            <enabled></enabled>
            <staticBindings>
                <staticBinding>
                    <autoConfigureDNS></autoConfigureDNS>
                    <bindingId></bindingId>
                    <vmId></vmId>
                    <vnicId></vnicId>
                    <hostname></hostname>
                    <ipAddress></ipAddress>
                    <defaultGateway></defaultGateway>
                    <leaseTime></leaseTime>
                </staticBinding>
            </staticBindings>
            <ipPools>
                <ipPool>
                    <autoConfigureDNS></autoConfigureDNS>
                    <poolId></poolId>
                    <ipRange></ipRange>
                    <defaultGateway></defaultGateway>
                    <leaseTime></leaseTime>
                </ipPool>
            </ipPools>
            <logging>
                <enable></enable>
                <logLevel></logLevel>
            </logging>
        </dhcp>
        <nat>
            <natRules>
                <natRule>
                    <ruleId></ruleId>
                    <ruleTag></ruleTag>
                    <ruleType></ruleType>
                    <action></action>
                    <vnic></vnic>
                    <originalAddress></originalAddress>
                    <translatedAddress></translatedAddress>
                    <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
                    <enabled></enabled>
                    <protocol></protocol>
                    <originalPort></originalPort>
                    <translatedPort></translatedPort>
                </natRule>
            </natRules>
        </nat>
    </features>
    <autoConfiguration>
        <enabled></enabled>
        <rulePriority></rulePriority>
    </autoConfiguration>
</edge>

                                                                                                                                                              delete nsxEdge /4.0/edges/{edgeId}

                                                                                                                                                              Delete specified Edge from database. Associated appliances are also deleted

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              dns /dnsclient put

                                                                                                                                                              DNS settings (primary/secondary and search domain) of an Edge

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Update Edge DNS settings

                                                                                                                                                              put dns /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/dnsclient

                                                                                                                                                              Update Edge DNS settings

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <dns>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <dnsServers>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
    </dnsServers>
    <cacheSize></cacheSize>
    <listeners>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
    </listeners>
    <logging>
        <logLevel></logLevel>
        <enable></enable>
    </logging>
</dns>

                                                                                                                                                              aesni /aesni post

                                                                                                                                                              AESNI Setting

                                                                                                                                                              post

                                                                                                                                                              Modify AESNI setting

                                                                                                                                                              post aesni /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/aesni

                                                                                                                                                              Modify AESNI setting

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • enable: required (boolean)

                                                                                                                                                              coreDump /coredump post

                                                                                                                                                              Enabling core-dump feature results in deployment of inbuilt extra disk to save core-dump files. 1GB for compact edge and 8GB for other types. Disabling detaches the disk

                                                                                                                                                              post

                                                                                                                                                              Modify core dump setting

                                                                                                                                                              post coreDump /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/coredump

                                                                                                                                                              Modify core dump setting

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              fips /fips post

                                                                                                                                                              FIPs setting

                                                                                                                                                              post

                                                                                                                                                              Modify FIPs setting

                                                                                                                                                              post fips /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/fips

                                                                                                                                                              Modify FIPs setting

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • enable: required (boolean)

                                                                                                                                                              logging /logging post

                                                                                                                                                              Log setting

                                                                                                                                                              post

                                                                                                                                                              Modify log setting

                                                                                                                                                              post logging /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/logging

                                                                                                                                                              Modify log setting

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • level: (string)

                                                                                                                                                              summary /summary get

                                                                                                                                                              Edge summary

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve details about the specified Edge

                                                                                                                                                              get summary /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/summary

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve details about the specified Edge

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              status /status get

                                                                                                                                                              Edge status

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve the status of the specified Edge

                                                                                                                                                              get status /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/status

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve the status of the specified Edge

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • getlatest: (boolean)

                                                                                                                                                                true = fetch the status live from NSX Edge, false = fetch the latest available status from database

                                                                                                                                                              • detailed: (boolean)

                                                                                                                                                                true = fetch detailed status per feature, false = aggregated summary of status per feature

                                                                                                                                                              • preRulesStatus: (boolean)

                                                                                                                                                                true = fetch detailed output for pre rules in addition to the regular output

                                                                                                                                                              techSupportLogs /techsupportlogs get

                                                                                                                                                              Tech support logs for specified Edge

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve the tech support logs for Edge

                                                                                                                                                              get techSupportLogs /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/techsupportlogs

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve the tech support logs for Edge

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              cliSettings /clisettings put

                                                                                                                                                              Manage CLI credentials and access

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Modify CLI credentials and enable/disable SSH for Edge

                                                                                                                                                              put cliSettings /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/clisettings

                                                                                                                                                              Modify CLI credentials and enable/disable SSH for Edge

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <cliSettings>
    <userName></userName>
    <password></password>
    <remoteAccess></remoteAccess>
    <passwordExpiry></passwordExpiry>
    <sshLoginBannerText></sshLoginBanerText>
</cliSettings>

                                                                                                                                                              cliRemote /cliremoteaccess post

                                                                                                                                                              Enable or disable SSH on the Edge

                                                                                                                                                              post

                                                                                                                                                              Change CLI remote access

                                                                                                                                                              post cliRemote /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/cliremoteaccess

                                                                                                                                                              Change CLI remote access

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • enable: required (boolean)

                                                                                                                                                              nsxEdgeFirewallConfig /firewall/config get put delete

                                                                                                                                                              Configure firewall for an Edge

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Read the firewall configuration

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Configure firewall for an Edge

                                                                                                                                                              delete

                                                                                                                                                              Delete firewall configuration

                                                                                                                                                              get nsxEdgeFirewallConfig /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config

                                                                                                                                                              Read the firewall configuration

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              put nsxEdgeFirewallConfig /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config

                                                                                                                                                              Configure firewall for an Edge

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <firewall>
    <defaultPolicy>
        <action></action>
        <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
    </defaultPolicy>
    <globalConfig>
        <tcpPickOngoingConnections></tcpPickOngoingConnections>
        <tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets></tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets>
        <tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts></tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts>
        <dropInvalidTraffic></dropInvalidTraffic>
        <logInvalidTraffic></logInvalidTraffic>
        <tcpTimeoutOpen></tcpTimeoutOpen>
        <tcpTimeoutEstablished></tcpTimeoutEstablished>
        <tcpTimeoutClose></tcpTimeoutClose>
        <udpTimeout></udpTimeout>
        <icmpTimeout></icmpTimeout>
        <icmp6Timeout></icmp6Timeout>
        <ipGenericTimeout></ipGenericTimeout>
    </globalConfig>
    <rules>
        <rule>
            <ruleTag></ruleTag>
            <name></name>
            <source>
                <vnicGroupId></vnicGroupId>
                <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
                <ipAddress></ipAddress>
            </source>
            <destination>
                <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
                <vnicGroupId></vnicGroupId> 
                <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
                <ipAddress></ipAddress>
            </destination>
            <application>
                <applicationId></applicationId>
                <service>
                    <protocol></protocol>
                    <port></port>
                    <sourcePort></sourcePort>
                </service>
            </application>
            <matchTranslated></matchTranslated>
            <direction></direction>
            <action></action>
            <enabled></enabled>
            <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
            <description></description>
        </rule>
    </rules>
</firewall>

                                                                                                                                                              delete nsxEdgeFirewallConfig /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config

                                                                                                                                                              Delete firewall configuration

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              firewallRules /rules post

                                                                                                                                                              Firewall rules
