                                                                                                                                                              post

                                                                                                                                                              Add one or more rules. You can add a rule above a specific rule using the query parameter, indicating the desired ruleID.

                                                                                                                                                              post firewallRules /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config/rules

                                                                                                                                                              Add one or more rules. You can add a rule above a specific rule using the query parameter, indicating the desired ruleID.

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • aboveRuleId: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                rule Id

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <firewall>
    <defaultPolicy>
        <action></action>
        <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
    </defaultPolicy>
    <globalConfig>
        <tcpPickOngoingConnections></tcpPickOngoingConnections>
        <tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets></tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets>
        <tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts></tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts>
        <dropInvalidTraffic></dropInvalidTraffic>
        <logInvalidTraffic></logInvalidTraffic>
        <tcpTimeoutOpen></tcpTimeoutOpen>
        <tcpTimeoutEstablished></tcpTimeoutEstablished>
        <tcpTimeoutClose></tcpTimeoutClose>
        <udpTimeout></udpTimeout>
        <icmpTimeout></icmpTimeout>
        <icmp6Timeout></icmp6Timeout>
        <ipGenericTimeout></ipGenericTimeout>
    </globalConfig>
    <rules>
        <rule>
            <ruleTag></ruleTag>
            <name></name>
            <source>
                <vnicGroupId></vnicGroupId>
                <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
                <ipAddress></ipAddress>
            </source>
            <destination>
                <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
                <vnicGroupId></vnicGroupId>
                <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
                <ipAddress></ipAddress>
            </destination>
            <application>
                <applicationId></applicationId>
                <service>
                    <protocol></protocol>
                    <port></port>
                    <sourcePort></sourcePort>
                </service>
            </application>
            <matchTranslated></matchTranslated>
            <direction></direction>
            <action></action>
            <enabled></enabled>
            <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
            <description></description>
        </rule>
    </rules>
</firewall>

                                                                                                                                                              firewallRule /{ruleId} get put delete

                                                                                                                                                              Specific firewall rule

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve specific rule

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Modify a specific firewall rule

                                                                                                                                                              delete

                                                                                                                                                              Delete firewall rule

                                                                                                                                                              get firewallRule /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config/rules/{ruleId}

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve specific rule

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              • ruleId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Rule ID

                                                                                                                                                              put firewallRule /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config/rules/{ruleId}

                                                                                                                                                              Modify a specific firewall rule

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              • ruleId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Rule ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <rule>
    <ruleTag></ruleTag>
    <name></name>
    <source>
        <vnicGroupId></vnicGroupId>
        <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
    </source>
    <destination>
        <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
        <vnicGroupId></vnicGroupId>
    </destination>
    <application>
        <applicationId></applicationId>
    </application>
    <matchTranslated></matchTranslated>
    <direction></direction>
    <action></action>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
    <description></description>
</rule>

                                                                                                                                                              delete firewallRule /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config/rules/{ruleId}

                                                                                                                                                              Delete firewall rule

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              • ruleId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Rule ID

                                                                                                                                                              globalFirewallConfig /global get put

                                                                                                                                                              NSX Edge global firewall configuration

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve the firewall default policy for an Edge

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Configure firewall global config for an Edge

                                                                                                                                                              get globalFirewallConfig /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config/global

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve the firewall default policy for an Edge

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              put globalFirewallConfig /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config/global

                                                                                                                                                              Configure firewall global config for an Edge

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <globalConfig>
    <tcpPickOngoingConnections></tcpPickOngoingConnections>
    <tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets></tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets>
    <tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts></tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts>
    <dropInvalidTraffic></dropInvalidTraffic>
    <logInvalidTraffic></logInvalidTraffic>
    <tcpTimeoutOpen></tcpTimeoutOpen>
    <tcpTimeoutEstablished></tcpTimeoutEstablished>
    <tcpTimeoutClose></tcpTimeoutClose>
    <udpTimeout></udpTimeout>
    <icmpTimeout></icmpTimeout>
    <icmp6Timeout></icmp6Timeout>
    <ipGenericTimeout></ipGenericTimeout>
</globalConfig>

                                                                                                                                                              defaultFirewallPolicy /defaultpolicy get put

                                                                                                                                                              Default firewall policy for an Edge

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve default firewall policy

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Configure default firewall policy

                                                                                                                                                              get defaultFirewallPolicy /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config/defaultpolicy

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve default firewall policy

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              put defaultFirewallPolicy /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config/defaultpolicy

                                                                                                                                                              Configure default firewall policy

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <firewallDefaultPolicy>
    <action></action>
    <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
</firewallDefaultPolicy>

                                                                                                                                                              firewallStatistics /firewall/statistics/firewall get

                                                                                                                                                              Edge firewall statistics

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve number of ongoing connections for the firewall config

                                                                                                                                                              get firewallStatistics /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/statistics/firewall

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve number of ongoing connections for the firewall config

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • interval: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                60 min by default, can be given as 1 -60 min, oneDay | oneWeek | oneMonth | oneYear

                                                                                                                                                              firewallRuleStatistics /firewall/statistics/{ruleId} get

                                                                                                                                                              Statistics for firewall rules

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve stats for firewall rule

                                                                                                                                                              get firewallRuleStatistics /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/statistics/{ruleId}

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve stats for firewall rule

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              • ruleId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified rule

                                                                                                                                                              edgeNat /nat/config put get delete

                                                                                                                                                              SNAT and DNAT rules for NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Configure SNAT and DNAT rules for an Edge

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Query SNAT and DNAT rules for an Edge

                                                                                                                                                              delete

                                                                                                                                                              Delete all NAT rules for an Edge

                                                                                                                                                              put edgeNat /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/nat/config

                                                                                                                                                              Configure SNAT and DNAT rules for an Edge

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <nat>
    <natRules>
        <natRule>
            <ruleTag></ruleTag>
            <action></action>
            <vnic></vnic>
            <originalAddress></originalAddress>
            <translatedAddress></translatedAddress>
            <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
            <enabled></enabled>
            <description></description>
            <protocol></protocol>
            <translatedPort></translatedPort>
            <originalPort></originalPort>
        </natRule>
    </natRules>
</nat>

                                                                                                                                                              get edgeNat /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/nat/config

                                                                                                                                                              Query SNAT and DNAT rules for an Edge

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              delete edgeNat /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/nat/config

                                                                                                                                                              Delete all NAT rules for an Edge

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              edgeNatRules /rules post

                                                                                                                                                              NAT rules

                                                                                                                                                              post

                                                                                                                                                              Add a NAT rule above a specific rule in the NAT rules table (using aboveRuleId) or append NAT rules to the bottom

                                                                                                                                                              post edgeNatRules /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/nat/config/rules

                                                                                                                                                              Add a NAT rule above a specific rule in the NAT rules table (using aboveRuleId) or append NAT rules to the bottom

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • aboveRuleId: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified rule ID. If the ID does not exist, Edge Manager displays an error

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <natRules>
    <natRule>
        <action></action>
        <vnic></vnic>
        <originalAddress></originalAddress>
        <translatedAddress></translatedAddress>
        <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
        <enabled></enabled>
        <description></description>
        <protocol></protocol>
        <translatedPort></translatedPort>
        <originalPort></originalPort>
    </natRule>
</natRules>

                                                                                                                                                              edgeNatRule /{ruleID} put delete

                                                                                                                                                              Specified NAT rule

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Modify a NAT rule

                                                                                                                                                              delete

                                                                                                                                                              Delete a NAT rule

                                                                                                                                                              put edgeNatRule /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/nat/config/rules/{ruleID}

                                                                                                                                                              Modify a NAT rule

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              • ruleID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified rule ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <natRule>
    <action></action>
    <vnic></vnic>
    <originalAddress></originalAddress>
    <translatedAddress></translatedAddress>
    <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <description></description>
    <protocol></protocol>
    <translatedPort></translatedPort>
    <originalPort></originalPort>
</natRule>

                                                                                                                                                              delete edgeNatRule /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/nat/config/rules/{ruleID}

                                                                                                                                                              Delete a NAT rule

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              • ruleID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified rule ID

                                                                                                                                                              routingConfig /routing/config get put delete

                                                                                                                                                              Static and dynamic routing for each NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve routes

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Configure globalConfig, staticRouting, OSPG, BGP, and IS-IS

                                                                                                                                                              delete

                                                                                                                                                              Delete the routing config stored in the NSX Mgr database and the default routes from the specified NSX Edge appliance

                                                                                                                                                              get routingConfig /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve routes

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              put routingConfig /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config

                                                                                                                                                              Configure globalConfig, staticRouting, OSPG, BGP, and IS-IS

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <routing>
    <routingGlobalConfig>
        <ecmp></ecmp>
        <routerId></routerId>
        <logging>
            <enable></enable>
            <logLevel></logLevel>
        </logging>
        <ipPrefixes>
            <ipPrefix>
                <name></name>
                <ipAddress></ipAddress>
            </ipPrefix>
        </ipPrefixes>
    </routingGlobalConfig>
    <staticRouting>
        <staticRoutes>
            <route>
                <description></description>
                <vnic></vnic>
                <network></network>
                <nextHop></nextHop>
                <mtu></mtu>
            </route>
        </staticRoutes>
        <defaultRoute>
            <description></description>
            <vnic></vnic>
            <gatewayAddress></gatewayAddress>
            <mtu></mtu>
        </defaultRoute>
    </staticRouting>
    <ospf>
        <enabled></enabled>
        <defaultOriginate></defaultOriginate>
        <gracefulRestart></gracefulRestart>
        <ospfAreas>
            <ospfArea>
                <areaId></areaId>
                <type></type>
                <authentication>
                    <type></type>
                    <value></value>
                </authentication>
            </ospfArea>
        </ospfAreas>
        <ospfInterfaces>
            <ospfInterface>
                <vnic></vnic>
                <areaId></areaId>
                <helloInterval></helloInterval>
                <deadInterval></deadInterval>
                <priority></priority>
                <cost></cost>
            </ospfInterface>
        </ospfInterfaces>
        <redistribution>
            <enabled></enabled>
            <rules>
                <rule>
                    <prefixName></prefixName>
                    <from>
                        <isis></isis>
                        <ospf></ospf>
                        <bgp></bgp>
                        <static></static>
                        <connected></connected>
                    </from>
                    <action></action>
                </rule>
            </rules>
        </redistribution>
    </ospf>
    <isis>
        <enabled></enabled>
        <systemId></systemId>
        <areaIds>
            <areaId></areaId>
        </areaIds>
        <isType></isType>
        <domainPassword></domainPassword>
        <areaPassword></areaPassword>
        <isisInterfaces>
            <isisInterface>
                <vnic></vnic>
                <meshGroup></meshGroup>
                <helloInterval></helloInterval>
                <helloMultiplier></helloMultiplier>
                <lspInterval></lspInterval>
                <metric></metric>
                <priority></priority>
                <circuitType></circuitType>
                <password></password>
            </isisInterface>
        </isisInterfaces>
        <redistribution>
            <enabled></enabled>
            <rules>
                <rule>
                    <prefixName></prefixName>
                    <from>
                        <isis></isis>
                        <ospf></ospf>
                        <bgp></bgp>
                        <static></static>
                        <connected></connected>
                    </from>
                    <action></action>
                </rule>
            </rules>
        </redistribution>
    </isis>
    <bgp>
        <enabled></enabled>
        <localAS></localAS>
        <bgpNeighbours>
            <bgpNeighbour>
                <ipAddress></ipAddress>
                <remoteAS></remoteAS>
                <weight></weight>
                <holdDownTimer></holdDownTimer>
                <keepAliveTimer></keepAliveTimer>
                <password></password>
                <bgpFilters>
                    <bgpFilter>
                        <direction></direction>
                        <action></action>
                        <network></network>
                        <ipPrefixGe></ipPrefixGe>
                        <ipPrefixLe></ipPrefixLe>
                    </bgpFilter>
                </bgpFilters>
            </bgpNeighbour>
        </bgpNeighbours>
        <redistribution>
            <enabled></enabled>
            <rules>
                <rule>
                    <prefixName></prefixName>
                    <from>
                        <isis></isis>
                        <ospf></ospf>
                        <bgp></bgp>
                        <static></static>
                        <connected></connected>
                    </from>
                    <action></action>
                </rule>
            </rules>
        </redistribution>
    </bgp>
</routing>

                                                                                                                                                              delete routingConfig /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config

                                                                                                                                                              Delete the routing config stored in the NSX Mgr database and the default routes from the specified NSX Edge appliance

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              routingGlobalConfig /global put get

                                                                                                                                                              Global configuration

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Configure global route

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve routing info from NSX Mgr database (default route settings, static route configurations)

                                                                                                                                                              put routingGlobalConfig /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/global

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <routingGlobalConfig>
    <routerId></routerId>
    <logging>
        <enable></enable>
        <logLevel></logLevel>
    </logging>
    <ipPrefixes>
        <ipPrefix>
            <name></name>
            <ipAddress></ipAddress>
        </ipPrefix>
    </ipPrefixes>
</routingGlobalConfig>

                                                                                                                                                              get routingGlobalConfig /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/global

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve routing info from NSX Mgr database (default route settings, static route configurations)

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              routingConfigStatic /static get put delete

                                                                                                                                                              Static and default routes for specified Edge

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Read static and default routes

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Configure static and default routes

                                                                                                                                                              delete

                                                                                                                                                              Delete both static and default routing config stored in the NSX Mgr database

                                                                                                                                                              get routingConfigStatic /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/static

                                                                                                                                                              Read static and default routes

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              put routingConfigStatic /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/static

                                                                                                                                                              Configure static and default routes

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <staticRouting>
    <staticRoutes>
        <route>
            <description></description>
            <vnic></vnic>
            <network></network>
            <nextHop></nextHop>
            <mtu></mtu>
        </route>
    </staticRoutes>
    <defaultRoute>
        <description></description>
        <vnic></vnic>
        <gatewayAddress></gatewayAddress>
        <mtu></mtu>
    </defaultRoute>
</staticRouting>

                                                                                                                                                              delete routingConfigStatic /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/static

                                                                                                                                                              Delete both static and default routing config stored in the NSX Mgr database

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              routingOSPF /ospf get put delete

                                                                                                                                                              OSPF Routing for NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Query OSPF config

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Configure OSPF

                                                                                                                                                              delete

                                                                                                                                                              Delete OSPF routing

                                                                                                                                                              get routingOSPF /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/ospf

                                                                                                                                                              Query OSPF config

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              put routingOSPF /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/ospf

                                                                                                                                                              Configure OSPF

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <ospf>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <ospfAreas>
        <ospfArea>
            <areaId></areaId>
            <type></type>
            <authentication>
                <type></type>
                <value></value>
            </authentication>
        </ospfArea>
    </ospfAreas>
    <ospfInterfaces>
        <ospfInterface>
            <vnic></vnic>
            <areaId></areaId>
            <helloInterval></helloInterval>
            <deadInterval></deadInterval>
            <priority></priority>
            <cost></cost>
        </ospfInterface>
    </ospfInterfaces>
    <redistribution>
        <enabled></enabled>
        <rules>
            <rule>
                <prefixName></prefixName>
                <from>
                    <isis></isis>
                    <ospf></ospf>
                    <bgp></bgp>
                    <static></static>
                    <connected></connected>
                </from>
                <action></action>
            </rule>
        </rules>
    </redistribution>
</ospf>

                                                                                                                                                              delete routingOSPF /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/ospf

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <isis>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <systemId></systemId>
    <areaIds>
        <areaId></areaId>
    </areaIds>
    <isType></isType>
    <domainPassword></domainPassword>
    <areaPassword></areaPassword>
    <isisInterfaces>
        <isisInterface>
            <vnic></vnic>
            <meshGroup></meshGroup>
            <helloInterval></helloInterval>
            <helloMultiplier></helloMultiplier>
            <lspInterval></lspInterval>
            <metric></metric>
            <priority></priority>
            <circuitType></circuitType>
            <password></password>
        </isisInterface>
    </isisInterfaces>
    <redistribution>
        <enabled></enabled>
        <rules>
            <rule>
                <prefixName></prefixName>
                <from>
                    <isis></isis>
                    <ospf></ospf>
                    <bgp></bgp>
                    <static></static>
                    <connected></connected>
                </from>
                <action></action>
            </rule>
        </rules>
    </redistribution>
</isis>

                                                                                                                                                              put routingBGP /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/bgp

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <bgp>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <localAS></localAS>
    <bgpNeighbours>
        <bgpNeighbour>
            <ipAddress></ipAddress>
            <remoteAS></remoteAS>
            <weight></weight>
            <holdDownTimer></holdDownTimer>
            <keepAliveTimer></keepAliveTimer>
            <password></password>
            <bgpFilters>
                <bgpFilter>
                    <direction></direction>
                    <action></action>
                    <network></network>
                    <ipPrefixGe></ipPrefixGe>
                    <ipPrefixLe></ipPrefixLe>
                </bgpFilter>
            </bgpFilters>
        </bgpNeighbour>
    </bgpNeighbours>
    <redistribution>
        <enabled></enabled>
        <rules>
            <rule>
                <prefixName></prefixName>
                <from>
                    <isis></isis>
                    <ospf></ospf>
                    <bgp></bgp>
                    <static></static>
                    <connected></connected>
                </from>
                <action></action>
            </rule>
        </rules>
    </redistribution>
</bgp>
