                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              put loadBalancer /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config

                                                                                                                                                              Configure load balancer

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <loadBalancer>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <enableServiceInsertion></enableServiceInsertion>
    <accelerationEnabled></accelerationEnabled>
    <logging>
        <enable></enable>
        <logLevel></logLevel>
    </logging>
    <virtualServer>
        <virtualServerId></virtualServerId>
        <name></name>
        <description></description>
        <enabled></enabled>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
        <protocol></protocol>
        <port></port>
        <connectionLimit></connectionLimit>
        <connectionRateLimit></connectionRateLimit>
        <applicationProfileId></applicationProfileId>
        <defaultPoolId></defaultPoolId>
        <enableServiceInsertion></enableServiceInsertion>
        <accelerationEnabled></accelerationEnabled>
    </virtualServer>
    <applicationProfile>
        <applicationProfileId></applicationProfileId>
        <name></name>
        <insertXForwardedFor></insertXForwardedFor>
        <sslPassthrough></sslPassthrough>
        <persistence>
            <method></method>
            <cookieName></cookieName>
            <cookieMode></cookieMode>
        </persistence>
    </applicationProfile>
    <pool>
        <poolId></poolId>
        <name></name>
        <description></description>
        <transparent></transparent>
        <algorithm></algorithm>
        <monitorId></monitorId>
        <member>
            <memberId></memberId>
            <ipAddress></ipAddress>
            <weight></weight>
            <port></port>
            <minConn></minConn>
            <maxConn></maxConn>
            <name></name>
        </member>
    </pool>
    <monitor>
        <monitorId></monitorId>
        <type></type>
        <interval></interval>
        <timeout></timeout>
        <maxRetries></maxRetries>
        <method></method>
        <url></url>
        <name></name>
    </monitor>
</loadBalancer>

                                                                                                                                                              pools /pools post get delete

                                                                                                                                                              Server pools manage load balancer distribution methods and has a monitor attached to it for health check parameters

                                                                                                                                                              post

                                                                                                                                                              Add a load balancer server pool to the Edge

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Get all backend pools for the specified NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                              delete

                                                                                                                                                              Delete all backend pools configured on the specified NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                              post pools /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config/pools

                                                                                                                                                              Add a load balancer server pool to the Edge

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <pool>
    <name></name>
    <description></description>
    <transparent></transparent>
    <algorithm></algorithm>
    <monitorId></monitorId>
    <member>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
        <weight></weight>
        <port></port>
        <minConn></minConn>
        <maxConn></maxConn>
        <name></name>
        <monitorPort></monitorPort>
    </member>
</pool>

                                                                                                                                                              edgeDns /dns/config get put delete

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <dns>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <dnsServers>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
    </dnsServers>
    <cacheSize></cacheSize>
    <listeners>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
    </listeners>
    <logging>
        <logLevel></logLevel>
        <enable></enable>
    </logging>
</dns>

                                                                                                                                                              dhcp /dhcp/config get put delete

                                                                                                                                                              Configure DHCP for NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Get DHCP configuration

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Configure DHCP service

                                                                                                                                                              delete

                                                                                                                                                              Delete the DHCP configuration, restoring it to factory default

                                                                                                                                                              get dhcp /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/dhcp/config

                                                                                                                                                              Get DHCP configuration

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              put dhcp /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/dhcp/config

                                                                                                                                                              Configure DHCP service

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <dhcp>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <staticBindings>
        <staticBinding>
            <macAddress></macAddress>
            <vmId></vmId>
            <vnicId></vnicId>
            <hostname></hostname>
            <ipAddress></ipAddress>
            <subnetMask></subnetMask>
            <defaultGateway></defaultGateway>
            <domainName></domainName>
            <primaryNameServer></primaryNameServer>
            <secondaryNameServer></secondaryNameServer>
            <leaseTime></leaseTime>
            <autoConfigDNS></autpConfigDNS>
        </staticBinding>
    </staticBindings>
    <ipPools>
        <ipPool>
            <ipRange></ipRange>
            <defaultGateway></defaultGateway>
            <subnetMask></subnetMask>
            <domainName></domainName>
            <primaryNameServer></primaryNameServer>
            <secondaryNameServer></secondaryNameServer>
            <leaseTime></leaseTime>
            <autoConfigDNS></autoConfigDNS>
        </ipPool>
    </ipPools>
    <logging>
        <enable></enable>
        <logLevel></logLevel>
    </logging>
</dhcp>

                                                                                                                                                              delete dhcp /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/dhcp/config

                                                                                                                                                              post

                                                                                                                                                              Add an IP pool to the DHCP configuration. returns a pool ID within a Location HTTP header

                                                                                                                                                              • enableService: required (boolean)

                                                                                                                                                                Set to true to enable, false to disable

                                                                                                                                                              privateNetworks /client/networkextension/privatenetworks post get put delete

                                                                                                                                                              Configure a private network to expose to remote users over SSL VPN tunnel

                                                                                                                                                              post

                                                                                                                                                              Add a private network

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Get all private network profiles in the SSL VPN instance

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Update all private network configs of NSX Edge with the given list of private network configs. If the config is present, it is updated; otherwise, a new private network config is created. Existing configs not included in the call body are deleted

                                                                                                                                                              delete

                                                                                                                                                              Delete all Private Networks from the SSL VPN instance

                                                                                                                                                              post privateNetworks /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/privatenetworks

                                                                                                                                                              Add a private network

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <privateNetwork>
    <description></description>
    <network></network>
    <sendOverTunnel>
        <ports></ports>
        <optimize></optimize>
    </sendOverTunnel>
    <enabled></enabled>
</privateNetwork>

                                                                                                                                                              get privateNetworks /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/privatenetworks

                                                                                                                                                              Get all private network profiles in the SSL VPN instance

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              put privateNetworks /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/privatenetworks

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              delete privateNetwork /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/privatenetworks/{networkID}

                                                                                                                                                              Delete private network

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              • networkID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified private network

                                                                                                                                                              netExtIpPools /client/networkextension/ippools post get put delete

                                                                                                                                                              IP pools to assign IP addresses to remote users

                                                                                                                                                              post

                                                                                                                                                              Create an IP pool

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Get all IP pools configured on SSL VPN

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Update all IP pools with the given list of pools. If the pool is present, it is updated; otherwise, a new pool is created. Existing pools not in the body are deleted

                                                                                                                                                              delete

                                                                                                                                                              Delete all IP pools configured on SSL VPN

                                                                                                                                                              post netExtIpPools /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/ippools

                                                                                                                                                              Create an IP pool

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <ipAddressPool>
    <description></description>
    <ipRange></ipRange>
    <netmask></netmask>
    <gateway></gateway>
    <primaryDns></primaryDns>
    <secondaryDns></secondaryDns>
    <dnsSuffix></dnsSuffix>
    <winsServer></winsServer>
    <enabled></enabled>
</ipAddressPool>

                                                                                                                                                              get netExtIpPools /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/ippools

                                                                                                                                                              clientConfig /client/networkextension/clientconfig put get

                                                                                                                                                              Advanced parameters for full access client configurations--such as whether client should auto-reconnect in case of network failures or network unavailability, or whether the client should be uninstalled after logout

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Set parameters for full access client configurations

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Get client configuration

                                                                                                                                                              put clientConfig /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/clientconfig

                                                                                                                                                              Set parameters for full access client configurations

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <clientConfiguration>
    <autoReconnect></autoReconnect>
    <fullTunnel>
        <excludeLocalSubnets></excludeLocalSubnets>
        <gatewayIp></gatewayIp>
    </fullTunnel>
    <upgradeNotification></upgradeNotification>
</clientConfiguration>

                                                                                                                                                              get clientConfig /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/clientconfig

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                              installPackages /client/networkextension/installpackages post get put delete

                                                                                                                                                              Installation packages for SSL VPN clients

                                                                                                                                                              post

                                                                                                                                                              Create installers for full access network clients. These setup binaries are downloaded by remote clients and installed on their systems.

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Get information about all installation packages

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Update all installation packages with the given list. If the package is present, it is updated; otherwise a new installation package is created. Existing packages not included in the body are deleted.

                                                                                                                                                              delete

                                                                                                                                                              Delete all client installation packages

                                                                                                                                                              post installPackages /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/installpackages

                                                                                                                                                              Create installers for full access network clients. These setup binaries are downloaded by remote clients and installed on their systems.

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <clientInstallPackage>
    <profileName></profileName>
    <gatewayList>
        <gateway>
            <hostName></hostName>
            <port></port>
        </gateway>
    </gatewayList>
    <startClientOnLogon></startClientOnLogon>
    <hideSystrayIcon></hideSystrayIcon>
    <rememberPassword></rememberPassword>
    <silentModeOperation></silentModeOperation>
    <silentModeInstallation></silentModeInstallation>
    <hideNetworkAdaptor></hideNetworkAdaptor>
    <createDesktopIcon></createDesktopIcon>
    <enforceServerSecurityCertValidation></enforceServerSecurityCertValidation>
    <createLinuxClient></createLinuxClient>
    <createMacClient></createMacClient>
    <description></description>
    <enabled></enabled>
</clientInstallPackage>

                                                                                                                                                              get installPackages /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/installpackages

                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              put installPackages /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/installpackages

                                                                                                                                                              webResources /webresources post get delete

                                                                                                                                                              Web access server that a remote user can connect to via a web browser

                                                                                                                                                              post

                                                                                                                                                              Add portal web resource

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Get all web resources on the SSL VPN instance

                                                                                                                                                              delete

                                                                                                                                                              Delete all web resources on the SSL VPN instance

                                                                                                                                                              post webResources /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/webresources

                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <webResource>
    <name></name>
    <url></url>
    <method name="">
        <data></data>
    </method>
    <description></description>
    <enabled></enabled>
</webResource>

                                                                                                                                                              sslVPNUsers /auth/localserver/users post put delete

                                                                                                                                                              Portal users

                                                                                                                                                              post

                                                                                                                                                              Add a new portal user

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Modify the specified portal user

                                                                                                                                                              delete

                                                                                                                                                              Delete all users on the specifed SSL VPN instance

                                                                                                                                                              post sslVPNUsers /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/auth/localserver/users

                                                                                                                                                              Add a new portal user

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <user>
    <userId></userId>
    <password></password>
    <firstName></firstName>
    <lastName></lastName>
    <description></description>
    <disableUserAccount></disableUserAccount>
    <passwordNeverExpires></passwordNeverExpires>
    <allowChangePassword>
        <changePasswordOnNextLogin></changePasswordOnNextLogin>
    </allowChangePassword>
</user>

                                                                                                                                                              put sslVPNUsers /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/auth/localserver/users

                                                                                                                                                              Modify the specified portal user

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <user>
    <userId></userId>
    <password></password>
    <firstName></firstName>
    <lastName></lastName>
    <description></description>
    <disableUserAccount></disableUserAccount>
    <passwordNeverExpires></passwordNeverExpires>
    <allowChangePassword>
        <changePasswordOnNextLogin></changePasswordOnNextLogin>
    </allowChangePassword>
</user>

                                                                                                                                                              delete sslVPNUsers /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/auth/localserver/users

                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              user /{userID} get delete

                                                                                                                                                              Specified user

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Get information about a specified user

                                                                                                                                                              delete

                                                                                                                                                              Delete specified user

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              delete user /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/auth/localserver/users/{userID}

                                                                                                                                                              • Request
