                                                                                                                                                              authSettings /auth/settings get put

                                                                                                                                                              Authentication settings

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Get information about authentication server

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Set authentication process for remote users. Specify username/password authentication, active directory, ldap, radius, client certificate based authentication

                                                                                                                                                              get authSettings /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/auth/settings

                                                                                                                                                              Get information about authentication server

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              put authSettings /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/auth/settings

                                                                                                                                                              Set authentication process for remote users. Specify username/password authentication, active directory, ldap, radius, client certificate based authentication

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <authenticationConfig>
    <passwordAuthentication>
    <authenticationTimeout></authenticationTimeout>
        <primaryAuthServers>
            <com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.LdapAuthServerDto>
                <ip></ip>
                <port></port>
                <timeOut></timeOut>
                <enableSsl></enableSsl>
                <searchBase></searchBase>
                <bindDomainName></bindDomainName>
                <bindPassword></bindPassword>
                <loginAttributeName></loginAttributeName>
                <searchFilter></searchFilter>
                <enabled></enabled>
            </com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.LdapAuthServerDto>
            <com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.RadiusAuthServerDto>
                <ip></ip>
                <port></port>
                <timeOut></timeOut>
                <secret></secret>
                <nasIp></nasIp>
                <retryCount></retryCount>
            </com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.RadiusAuthServerDto>
            <com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.LocalAuthServerDto>
                <enabled></enabled>
                <passwordPolicy>
                    <minLength></minLength>
                    <maxLength></maxLength>
                    <minAlphabets></minAlphabets>
                    <minDigits></minDigits>
                    <minSpecialChar></minSpecialChar>
                    <allowUserIdWithinPassword></allowUserIdWithinPassword>
                    <passwordLifeTime></passwordLifeTime>
                    <expiryNotification></expiryNotification>
                </passwordPolicy>
                <accountLockoutPolicy>
                    <retryCount></retryCount>
                    <retryDuration></retryDuration>
                    <lockoutDuration></lockoutDuration>
                </accountLockoutPolicy>
            </com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.LocalAuthServerDto>
            <com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.RsaAuthServerDto>
                <timeOut>20</timeOut>
                <sourceIp>1.2.2.3</sourceIp>
            </com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.RsaAuthServerDto>
        </primaryAuthServers>
        <secondaryAuthServer>
            <com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.AdAuthServerDto>
                <ip>1.1.1.1</ip>
                <port>90</port>
                <timeOut>20</timeOut>
                <enableSsl>false</enableSsl>
               <searchBase>searchbasevalue</searchBase>
               <bindDomainName>binddnvalue</bindDomainName>
                <bindPassword>password</bindPassword>
                <loginAttributeName>cain</loginAttributeName>
                <searchFilter>found</searchFilter>
                <terminateSessionOnAuthFails>false</terminateSessionOnAuthFails>
                <enabled>true</enabled>
            </com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.AdAuthServerDto>
        </secondaryAuthServer>
    </passwordAuthentication>
</authenticationConfig>

                                                                                                                                                              rsaConfig /rsaconfigfile post

                                                                                                                                                              RSA authentication server, bound to the SSL gateway

                                                                                                                                                              post

                                                                                                                                                              Upload RSA config file (See "Generate the Authentication Manager Configuration File" section of the RSA Authentication Manager Administrator's guide for instructions on how to configure and download the RSA config file from RSA Authentication Manager)

                                                                                                                                                              post rsaConfig /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/auth/settings/rsaconfigfile

                                                                                                                                                              Upload RSA config file (See "Generate the Authentication Manager Configuration File" section of the RSA Authentication Manager Administrator's guide for instructions on how to configure and download the RSA config file from RSA Authentication Manager)

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              advancedConfig /advancedconfig get put

                                                                                                                                                              SSL VPN advanced configuration

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve SSL VPN advanced configuration

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Apply advanced configuration

                                                                                                                                                              get advancedConfig /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/advancedconfig

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve SSL VPN advanced configuration

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              put advancedConfig /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/advancedconfig

                                                                                                                                                              Apply advanced configuration

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <advancedConfig>
    <enableCompression></enableCompression>
    <forceVirtualKeyboard></forceVirtualKeyboard>
    <preventMultipleLogon></preventMultipleLogon>
    <randomizeVirtualkeys></randomizeVirtualkeys>
    <timeout>
        <forcedTimeout></forcedTimeout>
        <sessionIdleTimeout></sessionIdleTimeout>
    </timeout>
    <clientNotification></clientNotification>
    <enablePublicUrlAccess></enablePublicUrlAccess>
    <enableLogging></enableLogging>
</advancedConfig>

                                                                                                                                                              script /script post get put delete

                                                                                                                                                              Logon and logoff scripts for NSX Edge gateway

                                                                                                                                                              post

                                                                                                                                                              Configure parameters associated with the uploaded script file

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve all script configurations for the Edge

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Update all script configurations with the given list of configurations. If the config is present, its is updated; otherwise, a new config is created. Existing configs not included in the body are deleted

                                                                                                                                                              delete

                                                                                                                                                              Delete all script configurations

                                                                                                                                                              post script /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/script

                                                                                                                                                              Configure parameters associated with the uploaded script file

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <logonLogoffScript>
    <scriptFileId></scriptFileId>
    <type></type>
    <description></description>
    <enabled></enabled>
</logonLogoffScript>

                                                                                                                                                              get script /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/script

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve all script configurations for the Edge

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              put script /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/script

                                                                                                                                                              Update all script configurations with the given list of configurations. If the config is present, its is updated; otherwise, a new config is created. Existing configs not included in the body are deleted

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <logonLogoffScript>
    <scriptFileId></scriptFileId>
    <type></type>
    <description></description>
    <enabled></enabled>
</logonLogoffScript>

                                                                                                                                                              delete script /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/script

                                                                                                                                                              Delete all script configurations

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              scriptFileID /{fileID} get put delete

                                                                                                                                                              Specified uploaded script file

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve parameters associated with the specified script file

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Modify script parameters

                                                                                                                                                              delete

                                                                                                                                                              Delete script parameters

                                                                                                                                                              get scriptFileID /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/script/{fileID}

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve parameters associated with the specified script file

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              • fileID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified script file

                                                                                                                                                              put scriptFileID /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/script/{fileID}

                                                                                                                                                              Modify script parameters

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              • fileID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified script file

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <logonLogoffScript>
    <scriptFileId></scriptFileId>
    <type></type>
    <description></description>
    <enabled></enabled>
</logonLogoffScript>

                                                                                                                                                              delete scriptFileID /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/script/{fileID}

                                                                                                                                                              Delete script parameters

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              • fileID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified script file

                                                                                                                                                              scriptFile /file post

                                                                                                                                                              Logon and logoff scripts for NSX Edge gateway

                                                                                                                                                              post

                                                                                                                                                              Upload a login/logoff script. Returns a script file ID to configure the parameters

                                                                                                                                                              post scriptFile /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/script/file

                                                                                                                                                              Upload a login/logoff script. Returns a script file ID to configure the parameters

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              allUsers /sslvpn/auth/localusers/users put

                                                                                                                                                              All users of NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Update all users with the given list of users. If the user is present, it is updated. Otherwise, and new user is created. Existing users not included in the body are deleted.

                                                                                                                                                              put allUsers /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/auth/localusers/users

                                                                                                                                                              Update all users with the given list of users. If the user is present, it is updated. Otherwise, and new user is created. Existing users not included in the body are deleted.

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <users>
    <user>
        <userId></userId>
        <password></password>
        <firstName></firstName>
        <lastName></lastName>
        <description></description>
        <disableUserAccount></disableUserAccount>
        <passwordNeverExpires></passwordNeverExpires>
        <allowChangePassword>
            <changePasswordOnNextLogin></changePasswordOnNextLogin>
        </allowChangePassword>
    </user>
</users>

                                                                                                                                                              sslVPNActiveClients /sslvpn/activesessions get

                                                                                                                                                              Working with active clients

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve a list of active clients for the SSL VPN session

                                                                                                                                                              get sslVPNActiveClients /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/activesessions

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve a list of active clients for the SSL VPN session

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              session /{sessionID} delete

                                                                                                                                                              Specified client session

                                                                                                                                                              delete

                                                                                                                                                              Disconnect an active client

                                                                                                                                                              delete session /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/activesessions/{sessionID}

                                                                                                                                                              Disconnect an active client

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              • sessionID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified client session

                                                                                                                                                              sslVPNStats /statistics/dashboard/sslvpn get

                                                                                                                                                              SSL VPN statistics on the specified NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve SSL VPN statistics on the specified NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                              get sslVPNStats /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/statistics/dashboard/sslvpn

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve SSL VPN statistics on the specified NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • interval: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specify a range; can be 1 - 60 minutes, or oneDay|oneWeek|oneMonth|oneYear. Default is 60 minutes

                                                                                                                                                              ipsecTrafficStats /statistics/dashboard/ipsec get

                                                                                                                                                              Tunnel traffic statistics

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve tunnel traffic statistics for specified time interval. Default is 1 hour. Other possible values are 1-60 minutes|oneDay|oneWeek|oneMonth|oneYear

                                                                                                                                                              get ipsecTrafficStats /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/statistics/dashboard/ipsec

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve tunnel traffic statistics for specified time interval. Default is 1 hour. Other possible values are 1-60 minutes|oneDay|oneWeek|oneMonth|oneYear

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              vnicDashStats /statistics/dashboard/interface get

                                                                                                                                                              Dashboard statistics

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve dashboard statistics between the specified start and end times.

                                                                                                                                                              get vnicDashStats /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/statistics/dashboard/interface

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve dashboard statistics between the specified start and end times.

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • interval: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specify a start and end time range in seconds

                                                                                                                                                              vnicStats /statistics/interfaces get

                                                                                                                                                              l2VPN /l2vpn/config post get put delete

                                                                                                                                                              L2 VPN allows you to configure a tunnel between two sites. VM's remain on the same subnet in spite of being moved between these sites, enabling you to extend your datacenter. An NSX Edge at one site can provide all services to VM's on the other site.

                                                                                                                                                              post

                                                                                                                                                              Enable or disable L2 VPN service according to the value of the query parameter "enableService"

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve the current L2VPN configuration for NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Configure L2VPN for server or client

                                                                                                                                                              delete

                                                                                                                                                              Delete L2 VPN

                                                                                                                                                              post l2VPN /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/l2vpn/config

                                                                                                                                                              Enable or disable L2 VPN service according to the value of the query parameter "enableService"

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • enableService: required (boolean)

                                                                                                                                                                Enable or disable L2 VPN

                                                                                                                                                              get l2VPN /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/l2vpn/config

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve the current L2VPN configuration for NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              put l2VPN /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/l2vpn/config

                                                                                                                                                              Configure L2VPN for server or client

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              delete l2VPN /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/l2vpn/config

                                                                                                                                                              Delete L2 VPN

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              statistics /statistics get

                                                                                                                                                              L2 VPN statistics

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve L2 VPN stats, which has information such as tunnel status, sent bytes, received bytes etc. for the given Edge

                                                                                                                                                              get statistics /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/l2vpn/config/statistics

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve L2 VPN stats, which has information such as tunnel status, sent bytes, received bytes etc. for the given Edge

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              autoConfig /autoconfiguration get put

                                                                                                                                                              Auto config is enabled by default. If you disable, you must add required NAT, firewall, routing rules

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve auto config settings for the Edge

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Change the auto configuration settings for the NSX Edge
