                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              put autoConfig /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/autoconfiguration

                                                                                                                                                              Change the auto configuration settings for the NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <autoConfiguration>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <rulePriority></rulePriority>
</autoConfiguration>

                                                                                                                                                              appliances /appliances post get put

                                                                                                                                                              Working with Edge appliances

                                                                                                                                                              post

                                                                                                                                                              Change the size of both appliances

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve appliance configuration

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Modify appliance configuration (tip -- retrieve the config using GET call, then modify the parameters and send as body)

                                                                                                                                                              post appliances /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/appliances

                                                                                                                                                              Change the size of both appliances

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • size: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                set to compact|large|xlarge

                                                                                                                                                              get appliances /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/appliances

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve appliance configuration

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              put appliances /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/appliances

                                                                                                                                                              Modify appliance configuration (tip -- retrieve the config using GET call, then modify the parameters and send as body)

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              appliance /{haIndex} get put delete

                                                                                                                                                              Manage a specified appliance using its HA index

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Get configuration of specified appliance

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Modify the configuration of the specified appliance

                                                                                                                                                              delete

                                                                                                                                                              Delete the appliance

                                                                                                                                                              get appliance /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/appliances/{haIndex}

                                                                                                                                                              Get configuration of specified appliance

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              • haIndex: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified appliance HA index

                                                                                                                                                              put appliance /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/appliances/{haIndex}

                                                                                                                                                              Modify the configuration of the specified appliance

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              • haIndex: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified appliance HA index

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <appliance>
    <resourcePoolId></resourcePoolId>
    <datastoreId></datastoreId>
    <hostId></hostId>
    <vmFolderId></vmFolderId>
    <customField>
        <key></key>
        <value></value>
    </customField>
    <cpuReservation>
        <limit></limit>
        <reservation></reservation>
        <shares></shares>
    </cpuReservation>
    <memoryReservation>
        <limit></limit>
        <reservation></reservation>
        <shares></shares>
    </memoryReservation>
</appliance>

                                                                                                                                                              delete appliance /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/appliances/{haIndex}

                                                                                                                                                              Delete the appliance

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              • haIndex: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified appliance HA index

                                                                                                                                                              vnics /vnics post get

                                                                                                                                                              Working with interfaces. Add up to ten internal/uplink interfaces to each Edge. Each Edge must have at least one internal interface

                                                                                                                                                              post

                                                                                                                                                              Add an interface or sub interface

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve all interfaces for Edge

                                                                                                                                                              post vnics /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/vnics

                                                                                                                                                              Add an interface or sub interface

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • action: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                always set to "patch"

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              get vnics /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/vnics

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve all interfaces for Edge

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              vnic /{index} get put delete

                                                                                                                                                              Specified interface by index

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Modify the specified interface

                                                                                                                                                              delete

                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              • index: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified interface

                                                                                                                                                              put vnic /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/vnics/{index}

                                                                                                                                                              Modify the specified interface

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              • index: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified interface

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              delete vnic /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/vnics/{index}

                                                                                                                                                              Delete interface

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              • index: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified interface

                                                                                                                                                              mgmtInterface /mgmtinterface get put

                                                                                                                                                              Working with management interfaces for an NSX Edge router

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve all managedment interfaces to the NSX Edge router

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Configure management interfaces for NSX Edge router

                                                                                                                                                              get mgmtInterface /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/mgmtinterface

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve all managedment interfaces to the NSX Edge router

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              put mgmtInterface /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/mgmtinterface

                                                                                                                                                              Configure management interfaces for NSX Edge router

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <mgmtInterface>
    <addressGroups>
        <addressGroup>
            <primaryAddress></primaryAddress>
            <subnetMask></subnetMask>
        </addressGroup>
    </addressGroups>
    <mtu></mtu>
    <connectedToId></connectedToId>
</mgmtInterface>

                                                                                                                                                              interfaces /interfaces post get delete

                                                                                                                                                              Working with all NSX Edge router interfaces

                                                                                                                                                              post

                                                                                                                                                              Add interfaces for NSX Edge router. Can have up to 8 uplink interfaces

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve all interfaces for Edge router

                                                                                                                                                              delete

                                                                                                                                                              Delete interfaces

                                                                                                                                                              post interfaces /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/interfaces

                                                                                                                                                              Add interfaces for NSX Edge router. Can have up to 8 uplink interfaces

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • action: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Always set to 'patch'

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <interfaces>
    <interface>
        <name></name>
        <addressGroups>
            <addressGroup>
                <primaryAddress></primaryAddress>
                <subnetMask></subnetMask>
            </addressGroup>
        </addressGroups>
        <mtu></mtu>
        <type></type>
        <isConnected></isConnected>
        <connectedToId></connectedToId>
    </interface>
</interfaces>

                                                                                                                                                              get interfaces /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/interfaces

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve all interfaces for Edge router

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              delete interfaces /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/interfaces

                                                                                                                                                              Delete interfaces

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • index: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specify index of interface to delete (e.g. ?index=&index=). If no indices specified, all interfaces are deleted

                                                                                                                                                              interface /{index} get delete

                                                                                                                                                              Manage a specific NSX Edge router interface

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve information on specified Edge router interface

                                                                                                                                                              delete

                                                                                                                                                              Delete interface configuration and reset to factory default

                                                                                                                                                              get interface /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/interfaces/{index}

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve information on specified Edge router interface

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              • index: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified router interface

                                                                                                                                                              delete interface /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/interfaces/{index}

                                                                                                                                                              Delete interface configuration and reset to factory default

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge ID

                                                                                                                                                              • index: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified router interface

                                                                                                                                                              nsxEdgeJobs /jobs get

                                                                                                                                                              NSX Edge async jobs

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Query jobs. Assumes Edge is configured in async mode, where ?async=true is used at the end of any 4.0 service configuration URI for POST, PUT, and DELETE calls.

                                                                                                                                                              get nsxEdgeJobs /4.0/edges/jobs

                                                                                                                                                              Query jobs. Assumes Edge is configured in async mode, where ?async=true is used at the end of any 4.0 service configuration URI for POST, PUT, and DELETE calls.

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • status: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                status set to "all" or "active"

                                                                                                                                                              nsxEdgeJob /{jobId} get

                                                                                                                                                              Status of Edge async jobs. Assumes Edge is configured in async mode, where ?async=true is used at the end of any 4.0 service configuration URI for POST, PUT, and DELETE calls.

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve job status (SUCCESS/FAILED/QUEUED/RUNNING/ROLLBACK), URI of the resource, and ID of the resource as shown in response body

                                                                                                                                                              get nsxEdgeJob /4.0/edges/jobs/{jobId}

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve job status (SUCCESS/FAILED/QUEUED/RUNNING/ROLLBACK), URI of the resource, and ID of the resource as shown in response body

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • jobId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Job ID

                                                                                                                                                              nsxEdgeUpgrade

                                                                                                                                                              Upgrading NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                              nsxEdgeUpgrade /3.0/edges/{edgeID} post

                                                                                                                                                              post

                                                                                                                                                              Upgrade NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                              post nsxEdgeUpgrade /3.0/edges/{edgeID}

                                                                                                                                                              Upgrade NSX Edge

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • edgeID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified Edge

                                                                                                                                                              Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • action: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Set this to 'upgrade'

                                                                                                                                                              truststore

                                                                                                                                                              Operation on truststore (certificates)

                                                                                                                                                              certificate /certificate post

                                                                                                                                                              Certificates and certificate chains

                                                                                                                                                              post

                                                                                                                                                              Create certificate for CSR

                                                                                                                                                              post certificate /2.0/services/truststore/certificate

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <trustObject>
    <pemEncoding></pemEncoding>
</trustObject>

                                                                                                                                                              certificateScope /scope/{scopeId} get

                                                                                                                                                              Certificates for a scope

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Query all certificates for a scope

                                                                                                                                                              get certificateScope /2.0/services/truststore/certificate/scope/{scopeId}

                                                                                                                                                              Query all certificates for a scope

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • scopeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Scope ID

                                                                                                                                                              certificateSelfSigned /{scopeId} post

                                                                                                                                                              Working with vShield Edge self-signed certificates

                                                                                                                                                              post

                                                                                                                                                              Create a single certificate

                                                                                                                                                              post certificateSelfSigned /2.0/services/truststore/certificate/{scopeId}

                                                                                                                                                              Create a single certificate

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • scopeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Scope ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <trustObject>
    <pemEncoding></pemEncoding>
    <privateKey></privateKey>
    <passphrase></passphrase>
</trustObject>

                                                                                                                                                              certificate /{certificateId} get delete

                                                                                                                                                              Certificate specified by ID

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve the certificate object specified by ID. If the ID specifies a chain, multiple certificate objects are retrieved.

                                                                                                                                                              delete

                                                                                                                                                              Delete the specified certificate

                                                                                                                                                              get certificate /2.0/services/truststore/certificate/{certificateId}

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve the certificate object specified by ID. If the ID specifies a chain, multiple certificate objects are retrieved.

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • certificateId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                certificate ID

                                                                                                                                                              delete certificate /2.0/services/truststore/certificate/{certificateId}

                                                                                                                                                              Delete the specified certificate

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • certificateId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                certificate ID

                                                                                                                                                              csrCreate /csr/{scopeId} post

                                                                                                                                                              Create Certificate Signing Requests (CSRs)

                                                                                                                                                              post

                                                                                                                                                              Create a CSR

                                                                                                                                                              post csrCreate /2.0/services/truststore/csr/{scopeId}

                                                                                                                                                              Create a CSR

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • scopeId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Specified scope ID

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <csr>
    <subject>
        <attribute>
            <key></key>
            <value></value>
        </attribute>
    </subject>
    <algorithm></algorithm>
    <keySize></keySize>
</csr>

                                                                                                                                                              csrSelfSigned /csr/{csrId} put get

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Create a self signed certificate for CSR

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve specific CSR

                                                                                                                                                              put csrSelfSigned /2.0/services/truststore/csr/{csrId}

                                                                                                                                                              Create a self signed certificate for CSR

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • csrId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                CSR ID

                                                                                                                                                              Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • noOfDays: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                              get csrSelfSigned /2.0/services/truststore/csr/{csrId}

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • csrId: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                CSR ID

</trustObject>

                                                                                                                                                              crlID /crl/{crlId} get delete
