                                                                                                                                                              policy

                                                                                                                                                              Operations on policy objects

                                                                                                                                                              securityPolicy /securitypolicy post

                                                                                                                                                              Working with security policies (Endpoint, firewall, network introspection services applied to security group)

                                                                                                                                                              post

                                                                                                                                                              Create a security policy

                                                                                                                                                              post securityPolicy /2.0/services/policy/securitypolicy

                                                                                                                                                              Create a security policy

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <securityPolicy>
    <name></name>
    <description></description>
    <precedence></precedence>
    <parent>
        <objectId></objectId>
    </parent>
    <securityGroupBinding>
        <objectId></objectId>
    </securityGroupBinding>
    <actionsByCategory>
        <category></category>
        <action class="">
        <name></name>
        <description></description>
        <category></category>
        <actionType></actionType>
        <isActionEnforced></isActionEnforced>
        <isActive></isActive>
        <isEnabled></isEnabled>
        <secondarySecurityGroup>
            <objectId></objectId>
        </secondarySecurityGroup>
        <applications>
            <application>
                <objectId></objectId>
            </application>
            <applicationGroup>
                <objectId></objectId>
            </applicationGroup>
        </applications>
        <logged></logged>
        <action></action>
            <direction></direction>
            <outsideSecondaryContainer></outsideSecondaryContainer>
        </action>
    </actionsByCategory>
</securityPolicy>

                                                                                                                                                              securityPolicyID /{ID} get put delete

                                                                                                                                                              Specific security policy

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve security policy information

                                                                                                                                                              put

                                                                                                                                                              Edit a security policy

                                                                                                                                                              delete

                                                                                                                                                              Delete a security policy

                                                                                                                                                              get securityPolicyID /2.0/services/policy/securitypolicy/{ID}

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve security policy information

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • ID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                ID of desired security policy (or 'all' to include all security policies)

                                                                                                                                                              put securityPolicyID /2.0/services/policy/securitypolicy/{ID}

                                                                                                                                                              Edit a security policy

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • ID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                ID of desired security policy (or 'all' to include all security policies)

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <securityPolicy>
    <securityPolicy>
        <name></name>
        <description></description>
        <precedence></precedence>
        <parent>
            <objectId></objectId>
        </parent>
        <securityGroupBinding>
            <objectId></objectId>
        </securityGroupBinding>
        <actionsByCategory>
            <category></category>
            <action class="">
            <name></name>
            <description></description>
            <category></category>
            <actionType></actionType>
            <isActionEnforced></isActionEnforced>
            <isActive></isActive>
            <isEnabled></isEnabled>
            <secondarySecurityGroup>
                <objectId></objectId>
            </secondarySecurityGroup>
            <applications>
                <application>
                    <objectId></objectId>
                </application>
                <applicationGroup>
                    <objectId></objectId>
                </applicationGroup>
            </applications>
            <logged></logged>
            <action></action>
               <direction></direction>
                <outsideSecondaryContainer></outsideSecondaryContainer>
            </action>
        </actionsByCategory>
    </securityPolicy>
</securityPolicy>

                                                                                                                                                              delete securityPolicyID /2.0/services/policy/securitypolicy/{ID}

                                                                                                                                                              Delete a security policy

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • ID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                ID of desired security policy (or 'all' to include all security policies)

                                                                                                                                                              Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • force: (boolean)

                                                                                                                                                                If set to true, security policy is deleted even if it is being used somewhere

                                                                                                                                                              securityActions /securityactions get

                                                                                                                                                              Security actions for a security policy

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve security actions for a security policy

                                                                                                                                                              get securityActions /2.0/services/policy/securitypolicy/{ID}/securityactions

                                                                                                                                                              Retrieve security actions for a security policy

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • ID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                ID of desired security policy (or 'all' to include all security policies)

                                                                                                                                                              hierarchy /hierarchy post get

                                                                                                                                                              Security policy configuration import/export

                                                                                                                                                              post

                                                                                                                                                              Import a security policy configuration

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Export a Service Composer configuration and save to your desktop for use as a backup

                                                                                                                                                              post hierarchy /2.0/services/policy/securitypolicy/hierarchy

                                                                                                                                                              Import a security policy configuration

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • suffix: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                (optional) Added after names

                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                              Type: application/xml

                                                                                                                                                              Schema:

                                                                                                                                                              <securityPolicyHierarchy>
    <name></name>
    <description></description>
    <securityPolicy></securityPolicy>
    <securityGroup></securityGroup>
</securityPolicyHierarchy>

                                                                                                                                                              get hierarchy /2.0/services/policy/securitypolicy/hierarchy

                                                                                                                                                              Export a Service Composer configuration and save to your desktop for use as a backup

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • policyIds: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Comma separated security policy id's

                                                                                                                                                              • prefix: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                (optional) Some prefix to add before the names of the objects in the exported XML

                                                                                                                                                              securityActionVM /securityaction/category/virtualmachines get

                                                                                                                                                              Virtual machines for a security action

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Fetch all vm objects on which security action of a given category and attribute has been applied

                                                                                                                                                              get securityActionVM /2.0/services/policy/securityaction/category/virtualmachines

                                                                                                                                                              Fetch all vm objects on which security action of a given category and attribute has been applied

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              Query Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • attributeKey: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Attribute name

                                                                                                                                                              • attributeValue: (string)

                                                                                                                                                                Attribute value

                                                                                                                                                              securityActionSecGroup /securitygroup/{ID}/securityactions get

                                                                                                                                                              Security actions on a security group

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Query all security actions applicable on a security group

                                                                                                                                                              get securityActionSecGroup /2.0/services/policy/securitygroup/{ID}/securityactions

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                Specified security group

                                                                                                                                                              vmApplicableSecurityAction /virtualmachine/{ID}/securityactions get

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                              • Request

                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                              • ID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                VM ID

                                                                                                                                                              serviceComposerDFWSync /policy/serviceprovider/firewall get

                                                                                                                                                              Synchronizing Service Composer rules with distributed firewall

                                                                                                                                                              get

                                                                                                                                                              Query the time since when Service Composer firewall is out of sync with dfw, or synchronize Service Composer firewall with dfw

                                                                                                                                                              get serviceComposerDFWSync /2.0/services/policy/policy/serviceprovider/firewall

                                                                                                                                                              Query the time since when Service Composer firewall is out of sync with dfw, or synchronize Service Composer firewall with dfw

                                                                                                                                                              Secured by basic

                                                                                                                                                                secGroupPolicies /policy/securitygroup/{ID}/securitypolicies get

                                                                                                                                                                Retrieve security policies mapped to a security group

                                                                                                                                                                get

                                                                                                                                                                Retrieve security policies mapped to a security group

                                                                                                                                                                get secGroupPolicies /2.0/services/policy/policy/securitygroup/{ID}/securitypolicies

                                                                                                                                                                Secured by basic
                                                                                                                                                                • Request

                                                                                                                                                                URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                • ID: required (string)

                                                                                                                                                                  Specified security group ID

                                                                                                                                                                • vdsManage
                                                                                                                                                                • vdnConfig
